35:44: Kaadu a-koros magexinnaa baaxô bagul, eddeluk keenik naharat sugeh yan marak ellacabo kah tekke inna yableenim keh, usun (Nabii Saalic maraay, qaadaay Haixe kinnuk) keenik qandeh gidibuk sugeenik kaadu Yalla hebeltoh him mataanissaay, Kaak matassaqqa qaranwaa kee baaxô bagul enni ittaamak. Diggah Usuk ken taama yaaxigi, ken finqisaamah dudda-li kinni
35:45: Kaadu Yalli sinam dambik abteemil digaalinnay (abbixinnay) baaxô bagul mutuccu ittam cabak mananna, kinnih immay digaaláh keenih muggaqsime waktî fanah ken udurrusa, eddeluk ken wakti yamaate waqdi ken taamál ken galta, toysa diggah Yalli isi naqoosa yabali kinniih, tu-kaak maqellita
36:2: Yalli maxcoocá kak diggale Qhuraanal xiibita
36:3: Diggah nabiyow atu farmoytiitik numuk teyna kinnitoomul
36:4: Massa-le gitih bagul anuk (Islaam diini kinnuk)
36:5: A Qhuraan maysoleeh, nacrur-le Rabbih kabuk oobe
36:6: Nabiyow a-Qhuraan kol kah oobisnem abbobti kak meesiisime wayte mara edde meesissuh, usun iimaanak garcit yanin
36:7: Nummah ama-korosuk maggo maral digaalá dabaqteh, usun aamine waanamih sabbatah
36:8: Diggah nanu ken gaboobi ken fillittet nexeeh tet debeenat keenik neyseede, tohih sabbatah moyyaayi kareeril loonuuh, addah haanam maduudan
36:9: Kaadu foocal alifuh reebu keenik hayneeh, derrel alifuh reebu keenik hayne. Tokkel intiita keenik alifneh, tohih sabbatah usun cakkik-tu mayablan
36:10: Kaadu keenil inki gide nabiyow atu ken meesissam kee hinnay ken meesiise waytam, usun ma- yaaminan
36:11: Cagalah ku-meesisso tu-kah xiqtam Qhuraan kataateeh, qellut Yallak meesite numu, toysa kaa ayti-kumus dambi cabtii kee kaxxa galtól (jannat kinnuk)
36:12: Diggah nanu rabtem inkih naynuwweeh, addunyal maqaanék umaanék uysukummu heenim kee ken raatitte naktubeh, kaadu ummaanim baxxaqqa-le kitaabal (lowcal macfuuz kinnuk) lowsisne Gxxisne
36:13: Nabiyow isi marah magaalâ marih ceelallo ugur (waris) farmoytit keenih temeete waqdi
36:14: Namma farmoyta keenih rubne waqdii, ken nammay dirabboyseenih, kaadu sidoccaytut ken maqarrosneeh, diggah nanu sin fan rubsumte farmoytit kinnino keenik iyyen
36:15: Magaalâ mari woo farmoytiitik iyyeh; “isin tu-hinniton ninnah tan seehada kinnitoonum akke wayteenik, kaadu Yalli wacyik-tu moobisinna, isin ixxicci ittaanam manton dirab taceenim akke waytek”
36:16: Farmoytit keenik itteh; “diggah nanu sin fanah rubsumte farmoytit kinninom diggah Ni-Rabbi yaaxigeh”
36:17: Kaadu nel tanim matan baxxaqqa- le gudduysiyya akke waytek iyyen
36:18: Magaalâ mari keenik iyyeh; diggah nee geyte umaané siinik malkinna, usun xiibitak tamahak aadee wayteenik xeet siinit heennooh, qansarissa digaalá nek sin xagele iyyen
36:19: Farmoytit keenik itteh; sin geyte umaanéh malkit siinik yan, sinni Rabbil koroositteenimih sabbatah, kayri siinik edde yanim sin kassisnek, umaané nek malkittaanaah digaalál nee meesissaanaa? Aleey, wonna hinnay isin umaanét caddok tatura mara
36:20: Magaalák exxak xerrikek yarde num yemeete, yi-maraw farmoytit kataya keenik iyye
36:21: Farmô gudduysiyyal galtó sin esserewaa mara kataya usun tirtô bagul anuk
36:22: Kaadu anu yoo gine Rabbi kah aqbudewaam macaliyoo? Isin kaadu kaâ fanah aduurê ton rabteeniik lakal
36:23: Yallak kalah yallitte haysitoo? Yalli umaané yoh faxe kaa tekkek, ken cató tu-yoh maxiqtaay, Yallih digaalák yoo ma-wadaanak
36:24: Diggah anu toysa baxxaqqa-le makoh addat ayyo
36:25: Diggah anu sin Rabbil eemenehik yoo oobbiya keenik iyye
36:26: Too waqdi kaa qideeniih, Yalli jannat cul kaak iyye, maganey yi- mari aaxaginnay
36:27: Yi-Rabbi dambi yoh cabeeh, yessekexxime marih num yoo abem axcuk
36:28: Ken fayuh (catoh) yemeete num qideeniik lakal, kay maral qaraanak qande moobisinninooy, ahak dumal bayissi hayne marah malayka numtin baysah oobise mara makkinnino
36:29: Ken baati makkinna Jibriil inki xongolót tekkeh akke waytek, usun too waqdi inkih Rabte baruuga yekken
36:30: Naqoosa geyta nadaamaay! qhiyaamah ayró digaalá yablen waqdi, Toh ken kah geytam, hebeltô farmoytay keenih yamaate mayan, kaal anqasak sugeenim akķke waytek
36:31: A-koros matablaa! Keenik naharat makina hora bayisnem horaarik? Diggah usun ken fan addunyah aduure waanam mayablaanaa
36:32: Kaadu hebeltô ginó matan qhiyaamah ayró inkih Ni- garil gaaboysimaanaah xayyoysimaanam akke waytek cisaabah
36:33: Qhiyaamah ayró ugtoonu waanamih astá lon rabte baaxó naynuwweeh, ambó teetik nayyaaqeeh, woo ambók yakmeenimit
36:34: Kaadu tet (baaxó kinnuk) addal nakilaa kee qinabak yan basaatin hayneeh, daroorik-tu tet addal nuyfuxxuke (weeqisne)
36:35: Woh inkih kah abnem kay (basaatin kinnuk) mexexuk yakmeenî gidi. Kaadu amah ken gaboobi abtem hinna Yalli isi racmattah keenih abeemikkal, aniqmatal Yalla mafaatitaanaa
36:36: Ummaanimik qaynatitte gine Rabbi Saytunnooweh, baaxó uysubukku haytaamaay ken nafsik (labim kee sayim kinnuk) kaadu usun aaxige waanamak qaynatitte gine Rabbi Saytunnooweh
36:37: Kaadu laqó kak siibna bar astáh loonuuh, usun too waqdi ditet culan, toh Yallih dudda kinni
36:38: Kaadu Yallih dudda tascasse astá lon, ayróy leh tan madabah gexxal, toh mayso-li, ixxigalih yan Yallih caggudusiyya kinni
36:39: Kaadu astá lon mafdagoogi kah caggudusne alsál, tamiirâ (nakli) foynay ragteeh makkotteh innah gacca ittam fanah
36:40: Ayróh matakka alsá eleltam, kaadu barah matakka laqók yaakumem, ummaan tiya keenik isi maroh addal giirissa
36:41: Kaadu Yallih dudda tascasse astá lon, diggah nanu ken samad kibuk tan doynikit nukkuqeemil (Nabii Nuuc doynik kinnuk)
36:42: Kaadu Nabii Nuuc doynikih innah yan dawaanikiy edde feeraana keenih ginne
36:43: Kaadu fannek ken xuumusak (sutusak) nen, tokkel usun cateyna maloonuuy, usun mawaddiiman woo xuumiyyak (sutusiyyak)
36:44: Ken cattam matan Nanu keenih abne racmattaa kee yimixxige waktî (uddurih) fan keenit abne hatkisiyya akke waytek Nel yaduureenî gidih
36:45: Ama koros addunyâ digaaláa kee akeerâ digaalák meesita Yallak nacror geytaanam keh keenik iyyan waqdi, usun too waqdi derre edde cabaanaah, kaxxa-mariinitaanah
36:46: Kaadu ken Rabbih astootik hebeltoh astáy keenih tamaate matan derre teetit cabak sugeenim akke waytek
36:47: Kaadu korosuk Yalli siinih yeceemik-tu acuwa keenik iyyan waqdi, koroosite mari yeemene marak iyyah; Yalli faxinnay askamuk yen mara naskamoo? Yeemene maraw isin massat yan mara hinniton baxxaqqa-le hoxih addat taniinih akke waytek
36:48: A-xagni mawaqdiiy isin numma yacee mara tekkeenik itta koros
36:49: Israafiil baantah inki xongolók-sa qambaalaanam malon, is garcik ken tabbixe usun sinni caagiidat keemaaritak
36:50: Tokkel usun sitta farriimaanam maduudaanaay, sinni maraa kee buxaaxî fanah ma-gacan
36:51: Nammay haytô baantá fuxsumtaah, edde luk usun too waqdi magooqak sinni Rabbî fan sissikuk yawqen
36:52: Koros nadaamitak, nee gee finqaaw! ni-magooqak (kubuuruk) nee teyyeeqem miyyaay itte? Keenil gacisak ah Yalli sinam edde xagniseemiy, farmoytit nummâ xaagu kak tecee kinni keenik iyyan
36:53: Israafiil baantah inki xongolók-sa ken ugut magooqak edde yekkem mali, eddeluk usun inkih Ni-garil gaaboysimaanaah xayyoysiman cisab kee galtóh
36:54: Woo ayró (qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk) nafsi tul ma-yandulluma. Kaadu addunyal abak sugteenimik-sa elle galtimtaanam manton keenik iyyan
36:55: Diggah woo ayró Jannatti mari ruffu edde iyyan niqmatat agxitan
36:56: Ken kee ken agabi iraawoowal yanin qaraakiy (kaqaadid) amol cusuulah anuk
36:57: Usun Jannat addal maggo qaynatah yan caxâ mixu loonuuh, faxaanaah esseraanam elle lon niqmootak
36:59: Woo ayró a-umeyniitow moominiinik baxsima iyyan korosuk
36:60: Yalli ken sahitak keenik iyyah ; Aadam xayloy Yi-farmoytiitih arrabal sheetan aqbude waytaanaah kaa kataate waytaanamal sin ma- farriimiyyoo, diggah usuk siinik baxxaqqa-le naqboytak
36:61: Kaadu sin ma-amrisinniyoo dibuk Yoo uqbuda iyyaanamah, ah massa-le gita. (Islaam diini kinnuk)
36:62: Nummah sheetanti maggo mara siinik cakkik makehik kas- kassoowa mara matakkaanaa a-korosey
36:63: Ah-jahannam giráy addunyal kah xagnisimak sugteeni keenik iyyan akeeral
36:64: A-saaku tet culaay, teetit carara Yallal koroositak sugteenimih sabbatah
36:65: A-saaku ken afitte alifnaah ken gaboobi neê luk yabta, kaadu ken ibitte keenil sumaaqitta addunyal abak sugen umaanéh
36:66: Faxinninoy intiita ken waysiisak neneeh, duggu keenik haak nen, toysa gitâ fanah sissikuk gexak yenen kaal taturaanamkeh, tokkel mannal yableeniih intiita ken waysisne way
36:67: Fanne nee tekkek ginó keenik korisak neneeh, ken aracal ken daffeysak nen, toysa fooca fan gexaanam duudak manannoonuvy, wadir gacaanam duudak manannon
36:68: Idoolitti iyyam fan qumri kak neyxeere num ginó kaak korisnaah, yooboke saakih innah kaa gacisna hebeebih (sabarah), amah abe Rabbi qhiyaamah ayró ken ugusu waamih dudda leemil ma kas- kassoowaanaa
36:69: Ni-farmoyta Mucammad fzsakáýo Qadar kaa mabarsinninooy, kaa ma-ceela (ma-yangibbiya) Usuk kalah luk yemeetem mali Kassis kee baxxaqqa-le Qhuraan akke waytek
36:70: Ama Qhuraanal sorkocôbaxi (lubbi) kak nuwwa mara meesiisâ gidaay, korosul digaalâ maxcó nummattamkeh
36:71: Lacak nanu keenih ginneh nanim mayablaanaa! Ni-gaboobi abteemik, eddeluk usun kaa yamlikeenih (ikoytah kaa lon)
36:72: Kaadu kaa (lac kinnuk) keenih qanneh, tokkel tu-kaak feeraanaah, tu-kaak yakmeenih
36:73: Kaadu lacat maggo tuxxiq kee can kaak nakaanam lon, a-niqmat keenih abe Rabbi ma-faatitaanaa
36:74: Kaadu koros Yallak kalah yaqbuden yallitte haysitte Yallih digaalák ken cattam keh
36:75: Ken yallitte cató keenik maduddaay, koros kee ken yallitte inkih girâ digaaláh gaaboysimaanaah xayyoysiman tu- sittah xiqe kal
36:76: Toysa a-nabiyow usun Yallal koroositaanaah, koo dirabboysaanamih maxcó koo rookise waytay, diggah nanu qellisaanam kee yaybulleenim inkih keenik naaxigeeh ken elle galtenno
36:77: Ama seehadaytuy qhiyaamah ayró yangaddee mayablannaa! Diggah nanu daacoyti tiffak kaa ginnem, tokkel usuk baxxaqqa-le giddeyna
36:78: Kaadu ama giddeyni faxxiime wayta ceelallo Neh yoogoreeh, isi ginó hawweeneh (habbaaleh). Lafoofi iyyi yaynuwwee is bululteeh, rumah anuk iyye
36:79: Kaak ixxic nabiyow; naharsi adda tet gine Rabbi tet yaynuwwe! Usuk isi ginó inkih yaaxigi, kaak qellittam matan
36:80: Usuk anxaxin cooxuk girá siinih yeyyeeqe Rabbi kinni, tokkel isin woo cooxuk girá ursuttan
36:81: Kaadu qaranwaa kee baaxó gine Rabbi seehadah innah tanim ginaah gacsam ma-duudaa? Yeey, Usuk duudah. Kaadu Usuk ummaanim giné, ummaanim yaaxigi
36:82: Yalli tu-abam faxa waqdi cagalah kay amri wohiimik tik-iyyaama, edde luk wohim edde takke
36:83: Ummaanimih reedá gabat kak tan Yalli saytunnooweeh, cisab kee galtóh kaâ fanah gacsimtan
37:2: Kaadu Yalli qamburre foorisiyyah foorissa (wakayah wakayta) Malaykal xiibite
37:3: Kaadu Qhuraan kee Dikri akriyiyyah takriye malaykal xiibite
37:4: Diggah seehaday sin Yallay taqbudeeni inkittuk qibaadá kaah caglisa iyyaanamal xiibite
37:5: Usuk qaranwaa kee baaxóoy, ken nammayih fanal taniimih Rabbi, kaadu usuk ayrô mawqooqii kee ayrô kormaamî Rabbi kinni
37:6: Diggah Nanu addunyâ qaran cutuukat bilqisneh
37:7: Kaadu ummaan sheetanay Yallih taaqatak yewqek, qaran cutuukat dacrisna
37:8: Sheetoona qaran mataafaay, irô qaraanal tan Malaykah yab taabbem madudda, kaadu ummaan kabuk qambisimta
37:9: Woo ankactuk xiiriysimaanaah, amurruqe wayta digaalá-lon akeeral
37:10: Sheetoona Malaykak sissikuk qawta qangara akke waytek yaabbeenim maduudan, tokkel ura dabiitay ken cararisa ken kataata
37:11: Nabiyow toysa ken esser ginóh usun gibdoonu innaa hinnay Nanu ginnem gibdim ginoonak? Diggah nanu xankab itta kallay gabat kaftak ken ginne (ken abba Aadam kinnuk)
37:12: Wonna hinnay nabiyow koo dirabboysaanaah, qhiyaamah ayróh ugut yangaddeenim qajjibsittah usun kol anqaasak
37:13: Hawweeneenim ken kassiisan waqdi kas elle mageyaanaay, edde mayantifiqan
37:14: Kaadu atu Nabii kinnitom tascasse astá yablen waqdi teetil anqasaanaah qajjibsitan
37:15: Kaadu atu luk temeetem kalah tu- hinna, baxxaqqa iyya baab akke waytek kaak iyyen
37:16: Rabneeh burtaay lafoofi nakke waqdi, nanu diggah nuwwuk ugtennoo ninni magooqak? (Qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk)
37:17: Kaadu nek naharsi abbobtiy warrayte ugtelee iyyen
37:18: Yeey, ugtetton keenik ixxic nabiyow; isin xixxibaaneey, qunxaane-luk
37:19: Cagalah is Israafiil baantah inki xongoló, eddeluk usun magooqak ugtaanaah sinnik abaanam qambaalitan
37:20: Nee gee finqaaw! ah cisaabaay galtóh ayró iyyan (qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk)
37:21: Ah-meklah ayróy ginô fan qadlil edde meklaanay isin dirabboysak sugteeni keenik iyyan
37:22: Malaykak iyyaanah; koroosite maraa kee koroosannul ken kataateeh ken ceela maraay, usun Yallak kalah aqbaduk sugeenim gaaboysa
37:23: Eddeluk jaciim deqsitta giráh gita keenih escessa
37:24: Kaadu siraat garil ken eyseeda, diggah usun addunyal abeenimik esserimaanahak
37:25: Maca litoonuuh, itta kah cate waytaanam addunyal itta kah catak sugten innah keenik iyyan ken sahitak
37:26: Wonna hinnay usun asaaku (qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk) Yallih amrih gabá yeceenih xixxibaane luk
37:27: Korosuk mariiy marat afkanuk keemaaritak itta esseran
37:28: Diggah isin cakki-le kabuk nee gutuqak net amaatuk sugteeniih, baatil net bilqisak sugten iyyen kattaate mari katayen marak
37:29: Katayen mari keenil gacisak, wonna hinnay isin nummayse marah ma-suginniton keenik iyyan
37:30: Kaadu nanu sin amol qandey iimaanak sin edde waasna luk masuginnino, wonna hinnay isin dambit caddok tature marah sugten
37:31: Tokkel ni-Rabbih maxcó inkih nel nummatteh, diggah nee kee sin digaalá tammoysenno
37:32: Eddeluk Yallih gitaa kee iimaanak sin makkosneh, diggah nanu siinik dumaak makkoote marah sugne
37:33: Toysa diggah usun woo ayró (qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk) digaalál yangaleenih addunyal umaanél yengeleenimih sabbatah. (kattaate maraa kee katayen mara kinnuk)
37:35: Diggah usun (koros kinnuk) inki Yallak-sa cakkil yaqbuden Yalli mayan ixxica keenik iyyan waqdi, kaxxa-mariinitak sugen addunyal
37:36: Kaadu nanu diggah ninni yallitteh qibaadá gad-abê cabulih sabbatah cabnoo iyyen? (woh kak iyyaanam Yallih farmoyta kinnuk)
37:37: Wonna hinnay Nabii cakki baaheeh (Qhuraan kee Yalla inkittoysaanam kinnuk) farmoytit nummaysak yemeete
37:38: A-korosey isin diggah qansarissa digaalá tammoysetton qhiyaamah ayró
37:39: Kaadu addunyal umaanék abak sugteenimik-sa elle galtimtaanam manton akeeral
37:40: Yallih naqoosay qibaadá kaah caglissey Yalli isi racmat caglise akke waytek qansarissa digaalák naggowtam matan
37:41: Woo meqe maray Yalli doore yimixxige quusiy (rizqhiy) aggiriqqewaa lon
37:42: Woo rizqhi maggo caxâ mixu, usun Yalli keenih abe konnabá luk
37:45: Maqiin deqsitta daráh gocoyuk kibuk yan kaaqon keenit meksima
37:46: Ama gocoy qadoh, yaaqube marah satta-le
37:47: Usuk kas mabeyaay, amô berra mali kaadu usun kaat mayaskiran (madoomitan)
37:48: Kaadu ken xaqul saytun agabuy sinni baqoltik-sá num fanah waktewaay, qax-meqe intiita-le lon
37:49: Ama agbih weeló dansinte naalay gabá xage wayteh inna-le qidih
37:50: Tokkel jannatti mari, mariiy marat keenik yafkune addunyal keenil taturtem itta esserak
37:51: Jannatti marak yaabe num iyyeh; diggah anu rabak lakal tan manó yangadde kataysa luk suge addunyal
37:52: Diggah atu nummaysa marâ tanitoo? yok axcuk suge
37:53: Rabneeh, burtaay, lafoofi nakke waqdi, diggah nanu ugutnaah, cisab nek abaanaah, ninni taamoomil galtimennoo? yok axcuk suge
37:54: Woo moominti Jannatal isi kataysiisik, isin girát yoo lih maay boosittan woo korostih caalat nabaluh? Iyya
37:55: Eddeluk bossu iyyeeh, jaciim deqsitta girák gudel (guddaqtal) kaa yuble
37:56: Yallal xiibita immay, diggah yoo finqise raarte koo oggolinniyoy, kaak (kay kataysay addunyal rabak lakal manó tanim angadduk suge kinnuk) iyya woo moominti
37:57: Kaadu yi-Rabbi isi muxxóh tirri yoo heewannay, kôo luk girál xayyoysimeeh tet cule marih num akkuk-en
37:58: Nanu waaraah rabewaa mara hinninom hinnaa
37:59: Marabna nek naharsi rabay addunyal abne akke waytek, kaadu nanu diggalsimewaa mara hinnino innaa Jannat culleek lakal
37:60: Diggah nanu niqmatak edde nanim, usuk kaxxa affaafa
37:61: Annah yan niqmatay dudda- leh taamita mari toysa taamitay addunyal
37:62: Woo weeló kak taturte jannatih niqmatannaa, qibnaytiinoh taysem, hinnay zaqhqhuum deqsitta caxay cooxuk gactah taniy jahannam addal tani tayseeh
37:63: Diggah nanu korosuh aqayyaareh (mokkoroh) tet abne (zaqhqhuum kinnuk)
37:64: Diggah is jaciim deqsitta girák ragidik tawqe caxa
37:65: Tet mexexi diggah usuk sheetoonâ moyyaayih inna-le qaxumaaneh
37:66: Eddeluk diggah usun teetik yakmeeniih, bagitte teetik kiban
37:67: Tohuk lakal diggah tet bagul niqna kak caddok taturte leeh daragu-lon maaqabah
37:68: Too digaaláh lakal diggah gacsimeyna keenik jaciim deqsitta girâ fanah takke
37:69: Diggah usun sinni abbobti makkoote marah geen
37:71: Kaadu Nummah nabiyow ku- marak duma naharsi marak maggo mari makkoote
37:72: Kaadu nummah Yallih digaalák ken meesissa farmoytit keenih rubne addunyal
37:73: Tokkel meesiisen marih ellecabo kah tekke inna wagitey (cubbusey) nabiyow
37:74: Yallih naqoosay Yalli isi racmatat caglisey naggoyse akke waytek, qibaadá kaah cagliseenimih sabbatah
37:75: Yalli xiibitak iyyeh; Nabii Nuuc neh seeceh kay maral qokol kaah nakkem keh, tokkel nanu kaa oggola marak yayse mara kinnino
37:76: Kaadu kaa kee kay buxah maraay, moominiiniy kaâ luk teemene kaxxa gibdak naggosneh (leet xuunumaanamak, sutaanamak)
37:77: Kaadu kay samad raaqe mara ken abne, kay mari leet bayeek gamadal
37:78: Kaadu meqe xagar-xagoo kee fayla kay amol cabne ellecabô maray kaak lakal yamaatuwaah arrabat
37:79: Sinam addal Nabii Nuucuh saayaay nagaynan cabne
37:80: Diggah nanu meqe mara tonnal galatna
37:81: Diggah Nabii Nuuc ni-naqoosay teemeney Yallah qibaadá caglissek numuk teyna
37:82: Tohuk lakal aki maray kaa dirabboyse leet xuumusneeh (sutusne) finqisne
37:83: Kaadu diggah kay (Nabii Nuuc kinnuk) gital kaa kataate marat Nabii Ibraahim yan
37:84: Isi Rabbil saytun sorkocô baxa luk yemeete waqdi Yallat agleyta haamak
37:85: Isi abbaa kee isi marak Yallak kalah maca taqbudeniih iyye waqdi ken assacakkuk
37:86: Yallak kalah gersi yallitte diraabah taqbudenim faxxaanaa
37:87: Tohul ginô Rabbi maca siinik abelem takkaleeniih, Yallak kalihim tuqbudeenik
37:88: Tokkel ken qiidih keenil luk yawqeemik malkitih cutuukâ fanah wagittoh wagga hee
37:89: Edde luk diggah anu biyaakitah keenik iyye
37:90: Edde luk derre kaat cabba heenih gexen
37:91: Eddeluk ken yallitte fan sissikuk kelli iyyeeh (malgiyeh) matakmaanaa? iyye keenil anqasak
37:92: Maca liton kah yaabe waytaanaah essero yol kah gacse waytaanam keenik iyye Nabii Ibraahim
37:93: Edde luk Nabii Ibraahim keenit yufkuneh migdi gabah godmat ken aagaruk
37:94: Tokkel sissikuk naqabu luk kay mari kaah fan yufkuneeh nanu tet naqbudeeh, atu tet taggilee kaak iyyen
37:95: Isin sinni gabah urtaanam taqbudeenii, sin gine Rabbî qibaadá cabba hayteenih keenik iyye
37:96: Yalli sin kee isin abba haytaanam gineh anuk
37:97: Nabii Ibraahim Yaabah keenik yeyse waqdi, tokkel kay mari uma malah kaah malseeh xiso kaah xisaay jaciim deqsitta girát kaa gasiya (qambisa) iyyen
37:98: Kay mari uma malah kaah malseeh, guba raaqa mara ken abneeh, Nabii Ibraahim girák amaanah yewqe
37:99: Kaadu Nabii Ibraahim iyyeh; diggah anu guuroh inni Rabbî fan gexaah usuk tirri yoo heele (yoo ascassele)
37:100: Nabii Ibraahim Yi-Rabbow meqe marih loowot yan baxa yoh acuw iyye
37:101: Eddeluk dooqá kaak oggolleeh kaxxa xiq-le baxal kaa aytikumusne (berrakisne)
37:102: Ismaaqil yembeeh barak abballuk taamáh edde gexa caddo yoofe waqdi, yi-baxaw diggah anu soonol koo asguudem ublek, a-caagid wagitey maca kot ceela? Kaak iyye. Yi-babbaw elle amrisimtem ab, wohul Yalli faxek yisbire marih numuh yoo geettok kaak iyye
37:103: Edde luk Yallih amri oggolen waqdi (Nabii Ibraahim kee baxa kinnuk) abba seltah (xabanah) kaa oobise kaa yasgaaduh
37:104: Kaadu kaa secneh kee Ibraahimow axcuk
37:105: Nummah tuble soonó nummasseh, diggah nanu tonnal galatna meqe mara iyye Yalli
37:106: Diggah ta-amri (ku baxih masgaada kinnuk) is-baxxaqqa itta aqayyaare kinni
37:107: Kaadu nanu kaxxa maruwih (marugih) masgaadal kaa wadne (Ismaaqil kinnuk)
37:108: Kaadu Nabii Ibraahimih meqe xagar-xagoo kee fayla kay amol cabne elle cabô maray kaak lakal yamaatuwaah arraabat
37:109: Yallih xaquk nagaynan Nabii Ibraahimil yanay
37:110: Nabii Ibraahim kah galatne innah meqe mara tonnal galatna
37:111: Diggah Nabii Ibraahim ni- naqoosay teemenek numuk teyna
37:112: Kaadu Nabii Ibraahim Iscaaqh deqsita baxay Nabii yakkuwaay meqe marak numuk teynah yanil kaa ayti-kumusne (berrakisne)
37:113: Kaadu kaa (Ibraahim) kee Iscaaqhal barkat oobisne, kaadu ken nammayih samadak isi nafsih meqe num keenik yaniih, baxxaqqa-le dulmih koroosannut isi nafsi yadlume num keenit yanih
37:114: Yalli nummah xiibitak iyyeh; Nabii Muusaa kee Nabii Haaruun nabuwwannut gunneh
37:115: Kaadu ken nammay kee ken mara naggosneh kaxxa gibdak (xuumiyya kinnuk)
37:116: Kaadu ken qokolleeh, usun firqawnaa kee firqawni marak yayse mara yekken
37:117: Kaadu tawraat kitaabay baxxaqqa iyya ken nammayah necee
37:118: Kaadu ken nammay massa-le gital (Islaam diini kinnuk) tirri hayne
37:119: Kaadu meqe xagar-xagoo kee fayla ken nammayih amol cabne ellecabô maray keenik lakal yamaatuwaah arrabat
37:120: Yallih xaquk nagaynan Nabii Muusaa kee Nabii Haaruunul yanay
37:121: Diggah ken nammay kah galatne innah nanu meqe mara tonnal galatna
37:122: Diggah ken nammay Ni-naqoosay teemenek nammayak teyna
37:123: Kaadu diggah Nabii Ilyaas rubsumte farmoytiitik numuk teyna
37:124: Isi marak israa-iil xaylok Yallak ma-meesittaanaa? iyye waqdi keenih cus nabiyow
37:125: Numtin-welluy baqla deqsita taqbudeeniih, ginó-abák yayse gineynih qibaadá cabtaanaa
37:126: Yalli sin Rabbiy sin gineey, siinik naharsi abbobti gine Rabbi kinni
37:127: Eddeluk kay mari kaa dirabboyseeh, diggah usun gaaboysime loonuuh xayyowsime-lon girâ digaaláh
37:128: Yallih naqoosay Yalli isi racmat caglisey naggoyse akke waytek qibaadá kaah cagliseenimih sabbatah
37:129: Kaadu Nabii Ilyaas meqe xagar- xagoo kee fayla kay amol cabne ellecabô maray kaak lakal yamaatuwaah arrabat
37:130: Yallih xaquk nagaynan Nabii ĮIlyaasal yanay
37:131: Diggah Nabii Ilyaas kah galatne innah Nanu meqe mara tonnal galatna
37:132: Diggah Nabii Ilyaas ni-naqoosay teemenek numuk teyna
37:133: Kaadu diggah Nabii Luut rubsumte farmoytiitik numuk teyna
37:134: Nabiyow keenih cus; Nabii Luut kee kaal yeemene mara inkih digaalák naggosne waqdi
37:135: Idaltô daaqaynay (Nabii Luut barra kinnuk) digaalát raaqe maray finqitê luk raqte akke waytek koroositteemih sabbatah
37:136: Lakat Nabii Luut marak aka maray raqqayey kaa dirabboyse bayisneh
37:137: Kaadu diggah isin Makki maraw ken abuural taturak maacissan
37:138: Kaadu bar elle taturtaanahak kas elle mageytaanaa? Ken geytem sin geytaamak
37:139: Kaadu diggah Nabii Yuunus rubsumte farmoytiitik numuk teyna
37:140: Nabiyow keenih cus ; Nabii Yuunus isi marih naqabuh sinaamak kibuk tan doynik fan kude waqdi
37:141: Kaxxa haffó woo doynik marteeh tokkel meesiten waqdi doynik mari saami caxxa qideeh, Nabii Yuunus saami-caxxal kak yeysen marih num yekke
37:142: Badat kaa qideeniih, eddeluk kullunti kaa yunxuqe, usuk assacokka lem baahe numuh anuk
37:143: Diggah usuk Yalla maggom cusa marih numuh suge wannay
37:144: Kullinti bagut edde ugtan ayrô fan sugak yen (qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk)
37:145: Eddeluk kullinti baguk baddi afal deebol kaa qambisne usuk lakmisak
37:146: Yaqhtiin deqsita cooxuk caxá (xalâ caxá kinnuk) kay amol nuysubuke
37:147: Kaadu kay marak bool alfi yakke marah kaa rubne, hinnay wohuk fulaanah
37:148: Eddeluk kaa nummayseeniih, edde raban wakti keenik yamaatem fanah ken hatkisneh
37:149: Eddeluk nabiyow ken esser; ku- Rabbi say-xaylo leeh, usun lab- xaylo loonuu
37:150: Hinnak Malayka sayyoh ginnee usun abaluk
37:151: Oobbiyooy! diggah usun sinni diraabah iyyaanah
37:152: Yalli xaleh iyyan, diggah usun dirableelá kinnuk
37:154: Kee a-maraw maca liton! Mannal mekeltan Yallah say-xayló teexegeeniih, sinnih lab-xaylo teexegen waqdi
37:155: Makassittaanaa! Yalli barráa kee xaylo aallewaah, kak saytunnoowem
37:156: Hinnak baxxaqqa iyya sumaq litoonuu a-ittaanamal
37:157: Toysa sin kitaabay Yallih xaquk litoonu baahay, a-ittaanamal numma yacee mara tekkeenik keenik iyyan
37:158: Koros Yallaa kee Malaykâ fanal ramaddiinuu kee lagó heen, nummah malayká teexegeh diggah usun (koros kinnuk) girá digaalál gaaboysime loonuuh xayyoysime loonum qhiyaamah ayró
37:159: Yalli saytunnooweh kaa ceele waytaamay koros kaa edde weelossak
37:160: Yallih naqoosay Yalli isi racmatat caglisey kaa ceele wayta weelot kaa weeloyse wayta akke waytek
37:161: Toysa diggah korosey sin kee isin yallitte axcuk uqbuddu haytaanam
37:162: Isin Yallih giták num makot beya mara hinniton
37:163: Koroosannuh Jaciim deqsitta girá cula numuy Yalli tet culim elle mekle akke waytek
37:164: Malayka itteh; nek inki malaykatti mayan, qaraanal yimixxige arac-le kaa akke waytek
37:165: Kaadu diggah nanu Yallih qibaadáh saffih sollá
37:166: Kaadu diggah nanu Yalla ceele waytaamak Yalla saytunnosna
37:167: Diggah nabiyow atu rubsumtak naharat Makki koros axcuk sugte
37:168: “Kitoobaa kee anbiyak naharsi maral temeetem nel amaatinnay diggah oggolak nen
37:169: Yallih naqoosay Yalli isi racmatat caglise akkuk-nen”
37:170: Makki koros Qhuraan keenil yemeete waqdi kaal koroositeeniih, akeeral digaalák loonum sarrah aaxige-lon
37:172: Diggah usun sinni naqboytiitil qoklima mara kinnon
37:173: Kaadu diggah Ni-qande maysó lem addunyaay akeeral
37:174: Toysa nabiyow derre keenit (Makki koros kinnuk) cab dago waktî fanah
37:175: Kaadu ken qambal nabiyow digaalák keenil obtuwaytam sarrah ableloonuk
37:176: Tokkel edde qataatakaanam Ni- digaalá innaa nabiyow
37:177: Tokkel Ni-digaalá ken dabooqal (maaftal) keenil obta waqdi, toysa meesiisen marih maaci maxxu yoomeeh
37:178: Kaadu nabiyow derre keenit cab yimixxige waktî fanah
37:179: Kaadu nabiyow ken qambal Ni-digaalák keenil obtuwaytam sarrah ableloonuk
37:180: Nabiyow ku-Rabbi saytunnooweh maysó-le Rabbi, kaa ceele waytaamay kaa edde weelossu haanak
38:1: Saad- (edde faxem Yalli yaaxige), Yalli Qhuraanay kak garciteenim sinam kassiisal xiibite
38:2: Wonna hinnay koroosite mari cakkik kaxxa-mariinitaanam kee Yallaa kee Nabii cinat yanin
38:3: Makki marak duma sugte horaarik makina horá finqisneeh! eddeluk Ni-digaalá keenih temeete waqdi nee wada iyyeenih seecen, woo wakti kudim kee naggoowiyyi wakti akkewaak
38:4: Kaadu keenik yan meesiisé (Nabii Mucammad 4csafeńýķo kinnuk) keenih yemeetem qajjibsiteeniih, ah baab-li, kaxxa dirab-li itte koros
38:5: Yallitteeta inki Yalla abee Mucammad 4csafeáýķ2? Diggah tah qajiibik (cakkumuk) taniimik
38:6: Kaadu keenik kaxxa mari fooreh (koros kinnuk), sinni marak gexaay, isbira sinni yallitteh qibaadál keenik axcuk. Diggah tah Mucammad kah malse caagidik tanih tan sin diinik sin korisuuy, sin amol reeduh iyyen
38:7: A Yallih inkittinaaney Mucammmad 4rafeýķo nee kah seecah yani ellecabô diinil maabbino (Nabii Qiisâ diini kinnuk), usuk kah seecam tu-hinna diraabay ginnaasite akke waytek iyyen
38:8: Qhuraan nek fanaak Mucammadal obsimee? Tonna hinnay usun Yi- Qhuraanak agay waagat yanin nabiyow. Wonna hinnay uxih Yi- digaalá tammoyse weenik-sa woh kah iyyaanam
38:9: Hinnak ku-Rabbiy maysoleeh, kaxxa mattaccooleh racmattah kadnooni (olwá) ken xaqul maay tan
38:10: Hinnak qaranwaa kee baaxóoy, ken nammayih fanal taniimih reedá loonuu? Toysa qaran ken guddussah taniimil yawqoonay sinnih faxeenim abitoonuh
38:11: Ama korosuk koo dirabbossa qande buksumtu wayta qande keenik duma gaaboowe marak naharsi mari kah buksume innah
38:12: Nabiyow ku-marak duma Nabii Nuuc maraay, Qaad deqsita maraa kee firqawnay kaxxa qandee kee sinam edde digaalá xiikol-le inkih sinni farmoytit dirabboyseenih
38:13: Kaadu Samuuduuy, Nabii Luut maraa kee Garbô mari (Nabii Shuqeybi mara kinnuk) farmoytit dirabboyseh, toh inkih koroosannuu kee diraabal gaaboowe mara
38:14: Ama marak raaqe num mayan inkih farmoytit dirabboyseenih akke waytek. Eddeluk Yallih digaalá cakkisiteeniih keenil obteh
38:15: Ama mari qambaalam mali Israafiil baantah inki xongoló akke waytek, is idya maliiy, madaara mali Yallih amrih ummaanim bayissi haytam fan
38:16: Ni-Rabbow digaalák ni-maglab addunyal elle neh iysissik cisab ayrók (qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk) duma iyyen anqasah
38:17: Isbir nabiyow atu faxe waytaamay usun kok iyyaanal, kaadu Ni- naqsu Nabii Daawuuduy Yallih naqboytiitil qandeleeh, Yallih taaqatal sabri-le kassit. Diggah usuk Yalli kicniimih fan maggom gacé kinni
38:18: Diggah nanu qaleelá qanneh, is carraay saaku Nabii Daawuudû luk Yalla saytunnoysak
38:19: Kaadu haadá kaah qanneh, is kobxisimmi itteh Yalla kaâ luk saytunnoysak, usun inkih (qaleelaa kee haadá kinnuk) Yalli kicnim fan gacan
38:20: Kaadu Nabii Daawuuduh kay reedá kaah qandet maqarrosneeh, nubuwwannu kaah necee, kaadu yabti kurtaneh ixxiga kaah necee
38:21: Nabiyow ittawee namma numih xaagi koo yoofee, Nabii Daawuudul micraab (qibaadah arac kinnuk) koren waqdi
38:22: Nabii Daawuudul qibaadáh arac culeeniih keenik wariggite waqdi ma-meesitin! gariiy-garul caddok kak tature namma num kinninok, toysa ni-fan cakkil mekel kaak iyyen, kaadu meklal nee madluminaay, massa-le gitâ fan tirri nee hayis kaak iyyen
38:23: Keenik numukteyni diggah ah yi- toobokoytay sagla-taban kee sagla idá leeh, anu inki idá liyo. Tokkel tet yoh acuwa iyyeeh, yaabal yok yeyseh iyye
38:24: Nummah ku-idá isi illit yassagalluh kot abe esserot koo yudlumeh kaak iyye Nabii Daawuud, kaadu diggah tu-yessegelle marak maggo mari gari-garut caddok keenik tatura, Yalla nummayseeh meqe taamoomi abe mara akke waytek, usun dagoonuh caddok ittat taturewaa mari, tokkel Nabii Daawuud cagalah ama meklal kaa mokkorrem yismiteeh, isi Rabbik dambi cabti essereeh sujuuduh gomboh radak Ķaal yuduure
38:25: Tokkel too dambi kaah cabneeh, diggah usuk Ni-garil xaynaa kee meqe gacsimeyna-le akeeral
38:26: Nabii Daawuudow nanu diggah seehadah amol koo hayne baaxól ken caagiida bicissuh, toysa sinam fan cakkil mekelaay, kalbi- fayxi makataatin tonni Yallih gitak koo makelek. Diggah Yallih gitak makkoota mari gibdi digaalá-le, cisab ayró (qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk) hawweeneenimih sabbatah
38:27: Qaran kee baaxóoy ken nammayih fanal tanim deedalah magininnino, toh koroosite marih akkala, tokkel koroosite marah girâ digaaláh finqi yan qhiyaamah ayró
38:28: Hinnak yeemeneeh meqe taamoomi abe mara baaxól umaané abe marih inna ken abnaa? Hinnak Yallak meesita mara umeynit inna ken abnaa? (mabna)
38:29: Ah barkat-le kitaabay kol oobisne nabiyow, kay aayoota cubbussu haanam keh, kaadu qaafiyatah yan kas-le mari kassitam keh
38:30: Nabii Daawuuduh Suleymaan deqsita baxa necee. Nabii Suleymaan manxu meqe naqsu! Diggah usuk Yalla fan maggom gacé kinni
38:31: Carra sissik faariisiy sidiica ibah soola Nabii Suleymaanak fooca maksen waqdi cusey nabiyow
38:32: Tokkel diggah anu inni Rabbih kassitik faaris kacanu muxxuse iyye ayró reebut kay namma intik qellitti ittam fanah (korru ittam fan)
38:33: Yol tet gacisa iyyeh eddeluk arqoo kee fillitte teetik yargiqem (yaatukem) qimbise tu-maleelah maaqó takkem keh
38:34: Nummah Nabii Suleymaan mokkorreeh, rabe seehadaytih garab (kay agabuk tiyak teyna xalte galaloh garab kinnuk) ķorsil kaak qidne. Tohuk lakal Yallal yuduureeh yotoobe
38:35: Yi-Rabbow dambi yoh cabaay, yok wadir num geewaa reedá yoh acuw iyye. Diggah atu kaxxa acwa-li kinnitok
38:36: Tokkel dooqá kaak oggolleeh, caacay kaah qanneh usuk faxa ikke xabcinuk caalih kay amrih gexak
38:37: Kaadu sheetoonak xisne abba haytaamaay, badat kummu ittam inkih kaah qanne
38:38: Kaadu keenik aka maray silsilootat axawah yani kaah qanne
38:39: Yalli Nabii Suleymaanak iyyeh; tah Ni-mattaccook faxxa marah keenik acuy, hinnay keenik faxxa marak waas, wohul cisab kol mayanak
38:40: Kaadu diggah Nabii Suleymaan Ni-xaqul xayna leeh, meqe gacsimeyna-le akeeral
38:41: Nabiyow cus Ni-naqsu Nabii Ayyuub, isi-Rabbih seece waqdi, diggah sheetan yoo xageeh, yi- xagaral taqabiiy biyaakak sabab yekke axcuk
38:42: Ibá baaxót atukku hayis, daritta leey xabciniy edde kaqaltaah kak taaqubey edde qaffotta koh awqelek kaak iyye Yalli
38:43: Tokkel kaa qaffosneeh, barráa kee xaylooy wonnah tanim keenilluk ossantinah kaah necee, woh inkih Nek yan racmatay kaah abne, kaadu usuk abe sabri qaafiyatah yan kas-le marah kassit yakkem keh
38:44: Kaadu Yalli kaak iyyeh; ku-gabat faxiiqak axaw hiriggi hayisaay isi barrá edde atukku hayis xiibá maggalinay. diggah nanu sabri-le numuh kaa geyne mokkorol (Nabii Ayyuub kinnuk). Nabii Ayyuub manxu meqe naqsu! Diggah usuk Yalla fan maggom gacé kinni
38:45: Kaadu nabiyow cus ni-naqoosa; Nabii Ibraahimiiy, Nabii Iscaaqh kee Nabii Yaq-qhuub, usun qibaadál baari-le maraay, diini ixxiga-le mara
38:46: Diggah nanu caglisitan kaxxa tiyat ken caglisne, akeerâ kassit ken lubbit hayneemil
38:47: Kaadu diggah usun Ni-garil meqe maray dorsime kinnon
38:48: Kaadu nabiyow cus ni-naqoosa, Nabii Ismaaqiliiy, Al-yasaqaa kee Dalkifli, usun inkih Yalli ginók doore mara
38:49: Nabiyow ama anbiyak maqaanék koh cusnem kassiisi, diggah Yallak meesita mari meqe gacsimeyna-le akeeral
38:50: Qadni deqsitta jannoota lon, afoofi keenih fakimut kak anuk
38:51: Tet addal qaraakiyil qaxah anuk maggo caxâ mixuu kee yaaqubeenim tet addal esseritan
38:52: Kaadu sinni baqoltik-sa numû fan waktewaa agabuy fooduh (wadaayah) yani lon
38:53: Amah addunyal kah xagnisimten niqmata moominiiney cisab ayróh (qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk)
38:54: Diggah amah Ni-rizqhiy ambaxe sinniy aggiriqqewaa keenik iyya Yalli
38:55: Ama weelot kak yabne niqmoota Yallak meesita marih iimi. Diggah koroosannuu kee umaanét caddok tatre mari uma gacsimeyna le akeeral
38:56: Woh jahannam giráy culaana, is maxxu keenih gacta fidooy
38:57: Amah niqna caddok kak taturte lee kee girâ marih qasaalayih (qasleyih) digaalák tet tammoysoonay keenik iyyan
38:58: Kaadu aká (gersi) digaaláy woo digaalá celtay maggo qaynatah tani lon
38:59: Keenik iyyaanah; ah buttay girá siinî luk culta, arcibaa kee konnabah loonum malon, diggah usun girá culáy teetit cararta kinnon
38:60: Kataye mari kataaten marak iyyeh; wonna hinnay siini arcibaa kee konnabá sinnim, a-giráh digaalá neh xayyossem siini makot nee beyten waqdi addunyal, tokkel maxxu gaca dabqiiy jahannam dabqi
38:61: Katayte butta itteh; Ni-Rabbow ah neh xayyoyseeh makot nee bee numuh xirribuh tan digaalá kaah osis girál
38:62: Kaadu umeynit itteh; maca lino addunyal uma marat loowak sugne labha kah able waynam
38:63: Addunyal nanu keenit abne buraa kee anqas hoxak abnee? hinnay usun girál neê luk anuk ken able waytam ni-intiitaay
38:64: Diggah woo girâ mari sittat aba giddii kee keemaari nummay agay- waaga sinni
38:65: Ixxic nabiyow isi marak; cagalah anu meesiiseey, hebeltô Yalli mayan inki Yallay dirkiseh yaniy qibaadá dubuk cakkisita akke waytek
38:66: Qaranwaa kee baaxóoy, ken nammayih fanal taniimih Rabbi mayso-li, dambi cabti-li kaal gace marah
38:67: Ixxic nabiyow isi marak; ama Qhuraan kaxxa xaaguy tuxxiq-le
38:68: Isin derre kaat cabtaanaah, kaal mataamittan
38:69: Irô qaraanal tan malayka itta elle wayteemih ixxiga luk mananniyo, Nabii Aadam ginóh caagidil itta keemaarisen waqdi Yallak wacyi yol oobewannay
38:70: Yalli wacyi yol moobisa cagalah anu Yallih digaalák baxxaqqa-le meesiise siinih kinniyom akke waytek
38:71: Nabiyow cus :ku-Rabbi Malaykak anu diggah seehadaytu kallak gineyyo iyye waqdi (Nabii Aadam kinnuk)
38:72: Edde luk ginó kaak missossuuy, Yi-xaquk yan rooci kaat fuufussu haa waqdi, toysa sujuuduh kaah rada massakaxxah keenik iyye Yalli
38:73: Tokkel Malayka usun inkih tikki yaanamaak sujuuduh raden
38:74: Kaxxamariiniteeh koroosite marih num yekke ibliisty sujuud cine akķke waytek
38:75: Yalli kaak iyyeh; ibliisow inni namma gabat gine Aadamah kummattaamak maca koo waasseeh ? away kaxxamariinitta innaa, hinnay dumaak Yallal kaxxamariinite marih numuh sugteeh
38:76: Ibliis isi Rabbil gacisak, anu kaak ayseh, yoo girak ginteeh, kaa kallak ginte iyye
38:77: Yalli kaak iyyeh ; toysa jannatak eweq, diggah atu Yi- racmatak xiiriyime num kinnitok
38:78: Kaadu diggah Yi-abaaró ku-amol tan galtóh ayrô fanah (qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk)
38:79: Ibliis iyyeh ; toysa Yi-Rabbow yoo qambaalis ginó sinni magooqak edde ugsumtu wayta ayrô fanah (qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk)
38:80: Yalli kaak iyyeh :diggah atu qambalsima marih num kinnito
38:81: Wakti kak yimixxige ayrô fanah (naharsi baantá edde takke ayró kinnuk)
38:82: tokkel ku-nabnal xiibita immay inkih ken (Aadam xaylo kinnuk) makkoyseyyo iyye ibliis
38:83: Ku-naqoosak isi qibaadá caglisse moominiin akke waytek qibaadá koh cagliseenimih sabbatah
38:84: Yalli iyyeh; cakki Yok yaniih, cakkik-sa axcem mayyu
38:85: Diggah jahannam kibeyyo koo kee ku-samadaay, seehadak koo katatta haytem inkih
38:86: Ixxic nabiyow:ama korosuk; siinit aba seecol hebeltô galtó sin messeraay, aneewaytam bicsita marih num anu hinniyo Yallak yol ooba wacyi kataata ikkal
38:87: A-Qhuraan kalah tanim hinna ginóh (seehadaa kee ginni kinnuk), kassis yakkem akke waytek
38:88: Kaadu diggah aaxigetton a-korosey kay (Qhuraan kinnuk) xaaguu kee kay numma udduruuk (waktiik) wadiril
39:1: Ama Qhuraanih oobiyyi Yallay mayso-le naggaarah yanih kabuk yekke
39:2: A-nabiyow nanu diggah Qhuraan kitab nummal kol oobisne, toysa Yalla uqbud diini kaah caglisak
39:3: Oobbiyooy! Cagalah tan qibaaday saytunnowte lem dubuk Yalla, Yallak kalah awlaytit haysite mari iyyah; ken manaqbuda Yallat xayyoysiyyah nee xayyoysaanâ gidih akke waytek. Diggah Yalli usun diini caagidik itta elle waak sugeenimil ken fan meklah qhiyaamah ayró, diggah Yalli tirri mahaa isi Rabbi dirabboyseeh, koroosannut caddok tature num
39:4: Yalli baxa haysitam faxinnay, isih ginaamak isih faxam dooritak yen, Yalli saytunih, Usuk inki Yallay isih ginem dirkiséh yani
39:5: Yalli Qaranwaa kee baaxó nummal gine, bar laqót culsaah, laqó barat culsa, kaadu ayróo kee alsá isi naqoosah tuxxiiqih qane, ken nammayak kulli tiya muggaqsime waktî fanah gexxa (qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk). Oobbiya! Yalli mayso-li, dambi cabti-li kay naqoosak kaal yuduure marah
39:6: Sinaamey sin Rabbi inki nafsik (Aadam kinnuk) sin gineeh, tohuk lakat kay barrá kaak gine (Caawa kinnuk) kaadu lacak bacra qaynat siinih oobise lab-tii kee say-tiyah anuk, sin inaanih bagut sin gina ginóok-ginô lakal (qunxuffeey, dabloytaay, cadoyta kinnuk) sidiica diteh addat (baguuy, maxaxaay, urri- walammâ dite kinnuk). Toh sin Yallaay, sin Rabbi ummaanim giné, reedá lem Ķaa, Kaak-sá cakkil yaqbuden Yalli mayanak, toysa diggah Kay qibaadák mannal makkottaanaah
39:7: Sinaamey koroositten sin tekkek, toysa diggah Yalli siinik gaddali siinih maceyta, kaadu isi naqoosah koroosannu makicniiy, kaa faatitteenik siinik akcinele. Kaadu dambi-le nafsi aka nafsih dambi mayassukuqqa. Tohuk lakat siinik gacsimeyná sin Rabbi fan takkeeh, abak sugteenim siinih warsele, diggah Usuk sin alilwat tanim yaaxigi qellitti ittaamak
39:8: Seehadaytu gibdaabini xaga waqdi isi Rabbi kallacaah cató kaat faxa kaal adaaruk, tohuk lakat Yalli isi niqmat kaah yecee kaa tekkek, duma kaa edde kallacak sugeh yanim habbaalaah, Yallat agleytit haa kay gitak sinam makkoysam keh. A-nabiyow ama korostak ixxic; isi koroosannut dagoh gide hatak, diggah atu girâ marih num kinnitok
39:9: Ama korostay isi koroosannut hatka yayse innaa, hinnak soolak kummaatak barti-saaqoota isi Rabbi yateeqe numuy akeerâ digaalák meesitaah isi Rabbih racmatah sangeela yayseeh? A-nabiyow ixxic; yaaxige maraa kee aaxigewaa mara maay missowta? (ma-missowta) cagalah kassittaah taaxigem qaafiyatah yan kas-le mara
39:10: A-nabiyow Yi-naqoosak yeemene marak sinni Rabbik meesita keenik ixxic, a-addunyal sinni Rabbih qibaadá yeymeeqe mari akeeral maqaané-le (jannat kinnuk). kaadu Yallih baaxó farakka lek sinni Rabbi elle taqbudê rike guuruma. Cagalah yisbire marah ken galtó keenih cisab maleh dudsumta
39:11: A-nabiyow sinaamak ixxic ; diggah anu Yalla aqbudeemih amrisime qibaadá kaah caglisak
39:12: Kaadu muslimiin naharsittu akkeemih amrisime yi-ummattak
39:13: A-nabiyow sinaamak ixxic ; diggah anu inni Rabbih amri cinek kaxxa ayróh (qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk) digaalák meesita
39:14: A-nabiyow ixxic ; Yalla aqbude inni qibaadá kaah caglisak
39:15: Toysa Yallak kalah faxxa hayteenim uqbuda a-korosey cinteenik. A-nabiyow ixxic; diggah finqittem sinni nafsii kee sinni buxah mara finqise mara qhiyaamah ayró. oobbiya! Too finqi usuk baxxaqqa-le finqa
39:16: Woo mari qhiyaamah ayró giráy irok ken buultaah, gubak ken buulta lon. Too digaalát Yalli isi naqoosa meesiisa cibbarsimaanam (cubbusaanam) keh, Yi-naqoosay toysa Yok meesita
39:17: Sheetan taaqat kee Yallak kalihim yaqbudeenimik yexxeere maray Yallal yuduure usun ayti-kuma lon, toysa nabiyow Yi-naqoosa ayti- kumus
39:18: A-nabiyow ayti-kumus Yi- naqoosay maxcó ankacissaah taysem (Yallih maxcoo kee Yallih farmoytih maxcó) kak katatta, woo mari Yalli tirri ken hee kaadu woo mari usun qaafiyatah yan kas-le mara
39:19: Digaalâ qangara elle nummatte nun tirri haytam duddaa nabiyow? Toysa atu girál yan num waddam duddaa? (madudda)
39:20: Kinnih immay sinni Rabbik meesite mari jannatal fayya itta qarway xisoh ittak amol taniy weeqaytitte kak guba gexxa lon, woh Yalli isi naqoosay kaak meesittah cule xagna, Yalli isi xagna ma-maka
39:21: A-nabiyow matablaa diggah Yalli qaraanak lee oobiseeh baaxót tet culseeh, darooriy weqta tet abe, tohuk lakal maggo qaynatah tan buqrey bisi kak sissini (baxsa- le) teetit yayyaaqe, tohuk lakat kaftaah walqinuk tet table, tohuk lakat cafulay buluule tet aba Yalli. Diggah tama Yallih abinak cusneemit qaafiyatah yan kas-le marah kassis edde yan
39:22: Yalli islaamaninnoh alil kak fake num, edde luk isi Rabbik noorii kee tirtô bagul yani, usuk lubbi kak alifut yan numuy islaamaninnot derre cabeh inna maay kinni? (hinna) Yallih dikrik (Qhuraan kinnuk) sorkocô baxitte kak kafteeh, derre edde cabe marah toysa fingi yan, woo mari baxxaqqa-le makoh addat yan cakkik
39:23: Yalli yayse yab oobise (Qhuraan kinnuk), kitaabay maxcô maqaaneh tuuy-tu kak celtay xaganaa kee meesisso elle qagam-qagittay sinni Rabbik meesita marih arooba kak dibillitta meesih, tohuk lakat ken aroobaa kee ken sorkocô baxitte Yallih cusiyyah xabbacowtah, toh Yallih tirtóy isih faxe mara tirri elle haa, Yalli iimaanak makkoyse num tirri hée mali, Yalli a Qhuraanal yaamineemik makkoyse num tirri kaa haa num mali
39:24: Girát qiden numuy uma digaalát fooca garaysa yayse innaa, hinnay digaalák amaan geeh jannat cula num yayseeh qhiyaamah ayró? Kaadu daalimiinik addunyal abak sugten umaanéh galtó tammoysa keenik iyyan
39:25: Nabiyow ku-marak duma naharsi mari dirabboyseeh, tokkel digaalá kak aaxige waan kabuk keenit temeete
39:26: Edde luk Yalli addunyâ manol qunxaaneey, xixxibaane ken tammoyseeh, akeerâ digaalá wohuuk nabuk raqta aaxaguk suginnoonuy (koros KĶinnuk)
39:27: Kaadu nummah Yalli xiibitak iyyeh; ama Qhuraanih addal sinaamah ummaan ceelalloolak ceelallo noogore kassita mara yakkeenî gidah
39:28: Qarab afat yan Qhuraanay makooka sinni kaa abne Yallak meesita mara yakkeenî gidah
39:29: Yalli ceelallo yoogore; agleh yan mari itta elle waa numuy naqasuh yanii kee cagalah num dubuk leh yan naqasul, a nammay massoowaa ceelalloh? (ma-massoowa). Yalli dudda-le fayla dubuk-le, wonna hinnay maggo mari keenik ma- yaaxiga
39:30: A-nabiyow diggah atu rabetto, kaadu diggah usun rabe lon
39:31: Tohuk lakat sinaamey diggah isin qhiyaamah ayró sin Rabbih xaqul keemaaritetton, tokkel Yalli sin fan qadlil mekle-le
39:32: Kaadu Yallal ceele waytam diraabah heeh, Nabii Mucammadal Asale oobe Qhuraan kaah yemeete waqdi, Qhuraan dirabboyse numuk (korosta kinnuk) dulmih iyyi gacaah? (num magaca). Jahannam giráh addal koros orbeyná malinnaa? (yeey-leh)
39:33: Numma bahte ambiyaa kee ken nummasse moominiin, too mari usun Yallak meesita mara kinnon
39:34: Usun sinni Rabbih xaqul faxxa haanam-lon, toh meqe taamá abbaasite marih galtó
39:35: Yalli addunyal aben uma-taamá keenik duugam keh aben toobah sabbatah, kaadu ken galtóh ken galtá addunyal abak sugen meqe taamák tayseemil (jannat kinnuk)
39:36: Yalli isi naqsu (Nabii kinnuk) duude hinna innaa umaané kaah faxa marih umaanék (koros kinnuk)? yeey, kaa duudah. Nabiyow usun koo meesiisaanah usun Yallak kalah yaqbuden yallitte umaané kol baahele iyyaanamal. Yalli makkoyse num tirri-heey, tirri kaa haa mali
39:37: Kaadu Yalli iimaanal tirri hee num, makkoysey cakkik kaa makkoysa mali, Yalli maysoliy canê gacsa-le hinna innaa kaal koroosite maraa kee kaa cine maral? (yeey kinnih)
39:38: Yalli xiibitak iyyah; nabiyow qaranwaa kee baaxó iyyi ginee axcuk ken (koros kinnuk) essertek? Diggah Yalli ken gine axce- lon. Nabiyow Keenik ixxic; yoh warisay Yallak kalah taqbudeenim, Yalli umaané yoh faxe kaa tekkek, usun Yalli yol mekle umaané yok cataanam maay duudan? Hinnay racmatta (nacrur) yoh faxe kaa tekkek, usun Kay racmatta yok waasaanam maay duudan? Maduudan kok axce-lon, Yalli yoo xiqah keenik ixxic nabiyow, kibalsita mari Yallal kibalsitam ken amol tan
39:39: Keenik ixxic nabiyow; yi-maraw dooritten uma-gital taamita, diggah anu Yalli yoo kah amrise meqe- gital taamita num kinniyok. tokkel sarrah aaxigetton
39:40: Addunyâ manol kaa tayqunxee digaalá kah tamaateeh, akeeral amô kate wayta digaalá elle obta num yoo kinnik sin kinnim aaxigetton
39:41: Diggah Nanu nabiyow Qhuraan nummal kol oobisneh sinaamah tirtó yakkem keh. Toysa tirri iyya num isi nafsih sabbatah tirri iyyaah, makkoote num cagalah kay makóh umaané kay nafsil gacta. Kaadu atu nabiyow ken taamá dacrisé hinnito tirtól ken dirkissuh, kol tanim gudduysiyyâ kal
39:42: Yalli roocitte beyah nafsi raba waqdii kee rabewee nafsi xiinit yan waqdi. Tokkel raba elle mekle nafsih rooci yabbixeeh, raba elle meklewee nafsih rooci ruubah muggaqsime waktî fanah. Diggah tohut Yallih dudda tascasse astooti tan cubbusa marah
39:43: Hinnak Yallak kalah yaqbuden yallittey cató keenih takke haysiteenii Yallih xaqul? nabiyow Keenik ixxic; usun tu-yamlike mara akkewaakaa, isin keenit abtan qibaadak tu-aaxigekalaa isin cató keenit faxxaanam
39:44: Ixxic nabiyow; a-korosuk shafaaqatta inkih Yalli-le, qaranwaa kee baaxô reedá Usuk-le, tohuk lakat KĶaa fanah gacsimetton qhiyaamah ayró cisab kee galtóh
39:45: Kaadu Yalli dubuk cussuuma waqdii, ellecaboh ayró nummayse waa marih lubbitte diriggi itta. Kaadu Yallak kalah yaqbuden yallitte cussuumta waqdi, too waqdi usun wallitaanah
39:46: ixxic nabiyow :Qaranwaa kee baaxó gine yi-Rabboow! Qellittam kee tambulleem yaaxigow, ku-naqoosâ fan Atu mekelta qhiyaamah ayró sitta elle waak suggu iyyeenimil
39:47: Diggah dulmi abe mari (koros kinnuk) baaxô bagul tanim inkih maaluk aallinnoonuy, kaadu wonnah tanim dirribuh edde aallinnoonuy fidáh (catóh) kaa attacayyuk yenen qhiyaamah ayróh digaaláh umaanék cattimaanamkeh, Kaadu woo ayró addunyal Yallak cubak suge weenim keenih tumbullee digaalák
39:48: Kaadu aben umaaneh galtó keenih (koros kinnuk) tumbulleeh, elle angqasak sugeenim keenil obteeh maró keenit hayte digaaláh
39:49: Seehadaytu (korosta kinnuk) umaané xagta waqdii, Nee kallaca, tohuk lakat Nek yan niqmat kaah nacee waqdi cagalah anu liyo ixxigat yoh tontocowwime iyye. Wonna hinnay is aqayyaaré (mokkoró), kinnih immay keenik maggo mari toh aqayyaaré (mokkoró) kinnim ma-yaaxiga
39:50: Nummah keenik dumi mari (koros kinnuk) iyyeh tama maxcó, Tokkel abak sugeenim keenih xiqtem mali Yallih digaalák (maaluu kee xaylo kinnuk)
39:51: Tonnaah kaadu abeenimih umaané ken xagteh naharsi ummatta kinnuk addunyal. Kaadu ku- marak isi nafsi yudlume mari nabiyow! usun aban umaanéh galtó ken xagele, usun Yalla taanisá hinnoonuuy Ķaak ma- yassaqqan
39:52: Kaadu a-mari maaxaginnoonuu? diggah Yalli rizqhi isih kah faxa marah farakka haah, isih kah faxa maral keenik ceyissi haam? Diggah tohut astooti tan Yallih amri nummaysa marah
39:53: Nabiyow Yi-naqoosak sinni nafsil dambit caddok tatura marak Yallih racmattak mabboodina keenik ixxic; Diggah Yalli dambitte inkih cabá Ķaal yaduure marah. Diggah Yalli Usuk dambi-cabti-li, racmatta-li (xuwaw-li)
39:54: Kaadu sinaamey sin Rabbi fan gacaay, Kaah rammita digaalá siinit tamaatek dumal, tohuk lakat Yallih digaalák sin cattam mageytan
39:55: Kaadu kataya tayseemiy sin Rabbik siinil obte (Qhuraan kinnuk), Usuk sin elle amrisam kataataay, sin kak waasah yaniimik exxeera digaalá garciik (hurubbaak) siinit tamaatek dumal isin aaxigekal
39:56: Umaané abe nafsi axcewaan keh, yoo geyte nadaamaay! Yallih amri finqiseemih sabbatah, Yallih amril anqasa marat suge addunyal
39:57: Hinnay nafsi axcewaan keh, Yalli diggaluk tirri yoo hayinnay Yallak meesita marih num akkuken
39:58: Hinnay nafsi axcewaan keh digaalá yable waqdi, diggah addunyâ manóh madaara aallinniyoy meqe marih num akkuken
39:59: Maleey, atu kah itta inna hinna, nummah Yi-astooti koh temeeteeh, tet dirabbosseh kaadu kaxxa- mariinitteeh, koroosite marih numuh sugte kaak iyya Yalli
39:60: Qhiyaamah ayró Yallal ceele waytam diraabah hee marih foocitte dattoowah table. Jahannam giráh addal kaxxa-mariinoleelá orbeyná malinnaa? (Yeey-leh)
39:61: Kaadu Yalli isik meesita mara naggoysah, usun geenih yanin asallamih sabbatah, umam ken maxagtaay, usun ma-rookitan
39:62: Yalli ummaanim ginéey, Usuk (Yalli) ummaanimih wakiili (dacayri-li)
39:63: Yalli qaranwaa kee baaxô mafaatic- le. Yallih aayootal koroosite marii, woo mari usun finqiteeh kasaarite mara addunyaay akeeral
39:64: Ixxic nabiyow (tama korosuk) ; Yallak kalihim aqbudeemih yoo amrissaanaa kee a-tuugimaytittey
39:65: Yalli xiibitak iyyah; nabiyow wacyi koo kee kok dumá suge farmoytiitil obsimeh, Yallat agleyta haytek diggah ku-taamá bayele kaadu diggah finqiteeh, kasaarite marih num akketto
39:66: Wonna hinnak, nabiyow Yalla uqbud qibaadá kaah caglisak. kaadu KĶay niqmatal kaa faatita marih num tik
39:67: Yalla maynabinnon kaah taguude nabnah, baaxó inkitanuuk kay gabah addat anuk qhiyaamah ayró, kaadu qaranwa kay migdi-gabat xammaqimak, usuk saytuniih agleh kaat hayya haanamak fayya iyye
39:68: Kaadu baantá fuxsinteeh, qaranwal tanim kee baaxól tanim inkih rabteh Yalli raq kah faxem akke waytek. Wohuk lakat nammay haytoh adda teetit fuuxusa israafiil, edde luk usun magooqak ugtaanaah Yalli keenik abam qambaalitan
39:69: Kaadu qhiyaamah ayró baaxó isi Rabbih noorit iftaah, ummaan numuh abe taamá elle tan kitab xayyoysimaah, anbiyaa kee sumaq-mara baahaanah, kaadu Yalli ken fan cakkil mekla usun andullumekal
39:70: Kaadu ummaan nafsih abbaheemih galtó kaah duudusuntah maqaanée kee umaanék, KĶaadu Yalli Usuk, usun abba haanam yaaxigeh
39:71: Kaadu koroosite mari jahannam deqsitta girá fan forsima butta- buttah anuk. Tet (jahannam girá kinnuk) guffu haan waqdi tet afoofi fakkimtaah, tet loyná keenik ittah; Yallih farmoytiitiy siinik tani siinih mamattoo, sin Rabbih aayoota siinil akrayuk kaadu ta sin ayróh angaarawak sin meesiisak (kadak)? Yeey nummah nel yemeeteenih immay, digaalâ qangará korosul nummatteh iyyan
39:72: Jahannam degqsitta giráh afoofik cula keenik iyyan teetil waarak, manxu umaah kaxxa-mariinoleelah orbeyná
39:73: Kaadu isi Rabbik meesite mari jannat fanah forsima butta-buttah anuk. Kaa (Jannat kinnuk) guffu haan waqdi kay afoofi fakimit anuk geyan, kay loyná keenik ittah; nagayna sin amol tanay! sin caalat yemqehik jannat culá kaal waarak
39:74: Kaadu moominiin ittah; Yalli fayla-le, Kaay isi xagana neh nummayseceh, jannat baaxók faxxa hayna aracal noknam nee nagarsiise. Manxu meqeeh taamá yessemeqqe marih galtó
39:75: Nabiyow Malayka Yallih Qarshih deraafet maroh anuk ken table sinni Rabbi saytunnoysak faylisak kaadu ken (ginó kinnuk) fan cakkķil meklaah, Yalli ginô Rabbiy fayla-le iyyan Jannatti maraa kee girâ mari inkih
40:2: Ama Qhuraanih oobiyyi Yallay maysoleeh, ixxigaleh kabuk yekke
40:3: Yalli dambi cabeey, toobat oggoleey, gibdi digaalaliiy, maggo niqmat-li. Qibaadá cakkisittam matan inki Yallak-sa. Ginók gacsimeyná Ķaa fan takke qhiyaamah ayró
40:4: Yallih aayoota tangaddem matan koroosite mara akke waytek, toysa nabiyow koo duquuruse waytay usun baaxooxal aban angagoyyi addunyâ guranah
40:5: Makki korosuk naharat Nuuc maraa kee tengele buttaatiy ken lakat temeete sinni farmoytit dirabbosseh. Kaadu kulli ummatta isi farmoyta qiddaamih niyá haysitteeh, cakki edde bayissuh deedalal kaa giddisse. tohul ken digaallehik Yi- digaalá mannak teneeh
40:6: Tonnaah ku-Rabbih qangará nummatteh koroositeh yan maral, diggah usun girâ mara kinnoonumul, dumi ummattay isi farmoytit dirabbossel kah nummatte innah
40:7: Qarshi takkuqe malaykaa kee Qarshi deraafel maroh kaat keenik enni ittam sinni Rabbi saytunnoysan Ķaa faylisak kaadu Yallal yaamineeniih, nummayse marah Yallal dambi-cabti esseran; ni-Rabbow ummaanim racmat kee ixxigal duddeh, toysa Kol yaduureeh, Ku-gita kattaate marah dambi cabaay, Jaciim deqsitta giráh digaalák ken reebis axcuk
40:8: Ni-Rabbow kaadu ken kah xagnisseh tan qadni deqsitta jannoota ken culus, kaadu ken abbobtiiy ken agabuuy ken xaylok iimaan kee meqe taamáh abtot temqem keenik culus, diggah ni- Rabbow atu mayso-li, naggaara
40:9: Kaadu ken umaaneenah uma galtók ken naggos (dabbal) kaadu woo ayró (qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk) umaaneenâ galtók naggosse marii, toysa nummah keenih nacrurteh, woh kaxxa affaf kee kaxxa saami- maqaané kinni
40:10: Diggaluk koroosite mari seecimah, Yallih nagpþbi isin sinni nafsit abtan naqabuk nabuk raaqa girá cultan waqdi isin addunyal iimaan kee Yallih inkittinaane fanah seecimak sugten waqdi, tokkel cinteeniih elle koroositteenih keenik axcuk
40:11: KĶoros itteh; ni Rabbow namma adda nee qiddeeh namma adda nee tuynuwweeh ninni dambi neelemehik (nekeelehik) tokkel girák elle nawqeeh, addunyâ fan nee elle gacissa giti (gurri) maay yan? Meqe taamá taamitnam keh (aleey mayan)
40:12: Woo digaalá sin kah geytem a-korosey cagalah Yallih inkittinaanel secsimtan waqdi koroositak sugteeniih, Yallat agleyta heenik woh nummaysak sugteenimih sabbata, tokkel meklá- lem fayya-leeh nabna-le Yalla kinni
40:13: Yalla kinni isi astooti sin taybulleeh, qaraanak rizqhi edde yan rob siinih oobissam, kaadu ama astooti kassittam matan Yallak meesitaah, Yalla fan yaduure mara akke waytek meqe taamál
40:14: Toysa moominiiney Yalla uqbuda qibaadáa kee dooqá kaah caglisak koros tanqibeway
40:15: Yalli fayya iyyaah, fayya itta darajoota-le, Usuk kaxxa Qarshi- liiy, isi amrih wacyi oobisa isi naqoosak isih kah faxa maral, Yallih farmoyti naharsi maraa kee ellecabô mari edde yangoorowe ayrók ken meesiisam keh (qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk)
40:16: Usun (ginó kinnuk) woo ayró (qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk) yambulleenih Yallih foocal, Yallak ken kee ken taamoomiy addunyal abeenik-tu qellitekal.Yalli seecah asaaku reedá miyyi-leeh axcuk?Yalli isi nafsil isih gacisak inki Yallay dirkiseh yani-le axcuk
40:17: Asaaku (Qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk) ummaan nafsi addunyal umaanée kee maqaanék abba heemil galtima, asaaku dulmi mayan diggah Yalli cisaabat (fokkooqot) sissikih
40:18: Kaadu nabiyow ken meesis qhiyaamah ayróy xayik. Sorkocô baxitte garoyritte taafee waqdi Yallih digaaláh meesih hammii kee rookah miidimak. Daalimiin xayi kataysa maliiy, yab kak oggolan cateyna mali Yallih xaqul
40:19: Yalli yaaxigeh ganô wagitto abta intiitaa kee alilwa qellissi haytam maqaanée kee umaanék
40:20: Kaadu Yalli sinam fan qadlil meklaah, Kaak kalah yaqbudeenim tu-mameklta.diggah Yalli usuk yaabbi, yabali
40:21: Hinnak a-koros magexinnaa baaxô bagul yableenî gidah keenik duma suge marih ellecabo mannak tenem? Usun maqar kee baaxô bagul abuurah (raatowwah) keenik gibduk sugeeniih, Yalli ken dambih sabbatah ken finqiseeh, Yallih digaalák ken reebisé luk masuginnon
40:22: Too digaalá ken kah geytem diggah ken farmoytit baxxaqqooqil keenih amaatuk sugteeh, usun koroositak sugeenimih sabbata.tokkel Yalli ken finqiseh diggah Usuk xiqtó leeh, gibdi digaalá-le
40:23: Yalli nummah xiibitak iyyeh; Nabii Muusa Ni-kaxxa astootii kee baxxaqqa-le sumaaqay usuk farmoyta kinnim yascassel kaa rubne
40:24: Firqawnaay, Haamaanaay, Qhaaruunû fanah kaa (Nabii Muusa kinnuk) rubne, tokkel usun kaxxa mariinoh baab abeynaay kaxxa dirab-li kaak iyyen
40:25: Nabii Muusa nummah astooti-luk Ni-xaquk keenil yemeete waqdi, kaalluk yeemene marih lab xayló qidaay, sayim keenik nuwwuk caba iyyen, koros uma-malá finqa akke waytek tu-hinna
40:26: Kaadu firqawni isi kaxxa marak iyyeh; Muusa qiday yoo ixxicaay yoo cabaay Muusa isi Rabbih seecitay, diggah anu usuk sin diini siinik korsaah hinnay baaxô bagul umaané uguugusaah fixiixisaamak meesita iyye
40:27: Kaadu Nabii Muusa firqawnaa kee kay kaxxa marak iyyeh; diggah anu yi-Rabbiiy sin Rabbi maggansite ummaan kaxxa mariinoliy cisab ayró (qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk) nummayse waak
40:28: Firqawni buxah marak moomintuh yan numwyy isi iimaan qellisa keenik iyyeh; yi-Rabbi Yalla iyya num qiddaanaa nummah sin Rabbih xaquk baxxaqqoogqįi-le astooti luk siinih amaatuk? Kaadu Nabii Muusa dirab-li yekkek kay diraabih umaané kaal gaceleeh, numma yacee num yekkek usuk sin kah xagnisaamak tuk teyná sin xagele. Diggah Yalli tirri mahaa ummaan caddok taturlih yan numuy, maggo dirablih yani
40:29: Yi-maraw asaaku reedá liton baaxô bagul maysó-luk, toysa iyyi nee cate-le Yallih digaalá net temeete tet tekkek keenik iyye woo moominti. Firqawni isi marak iyyeh; sin aybulleem mayyu inni nafsii kee siinih maqaané edde ablem akke waytek, kaadu massa- le gitak- sah siinih ascassem mayyu
40:30: Kaadu yeemene num keenik iyyeh; (Firqawni buxah marih num kinnuk) yi-maraw anu diggah koroositeeh, ambiyâ qadaawatal maagoowe marat digaalá edde tekke ayróh innah tan ayrók siinih meesita Muusa qiddeenik
40:31: Nuuc maraay, Qaadaay, Samuuduuy, keenik lakal yemeete maray koroosannuu kee ambiyá dirabboysaanam qaadah luk suget tekke digaaláh inna-le digaalá siinit takkeemik siinih meesita. kaadu Yalli naqoosah dulmi mafaxaay, dambi maleh ken ma-digaalá
40:32: Kaadu yi-maraw diggah anu seecó edde maggo ayróh digaalák siinih meesita (qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk)
40:33: Jahannam giráh digaaláh gibdak derre cabak kuddan ayró isin Yallih digaalák sin caté manton kaadu Yalli makkoyse num tirri kaa haytam mali
40:34: Kaadu nummah Nabii Yuusuf Muusak naharat baxxaqqooqi- le astooti-luk siinil yemeeteeh, siinih luk yemeeteemit agay- waagittaanamak ma katinniton usuk rabba iyyam fan. too waqdi kay gamadal Yalli farmoyta maruuba itten, tonnaah Yalli makkoysah caddok taturlih yan numuy Yallih inkittinaanee kee kay astootit agay waagalih yani
40:35: Yallih aayoota giddiya marii hebeltô sumaaqay keenih yemeete aallekal, Yallih garii kee Yalla nummayse marih garil woo giddih naqbi yenbeh, tonnaah Yalli ummaan kaxxa mariinolih dulymeynih (umaané dirkiséh) lubbi alfah
40:36: Kaadu firqawni iyyeh; haamaanow fayya iyya kalqat yoh xis qaran edde aafee gititte edde maadam keeh
40:37: Qaranwâ gititte maadaah, Muusâ Yallat bossu axcê gidah kaadu diggah anu dirabli kaa akkale. Tonnaah firqawnat le-uma taamá bilqisinteeh, tirtô gitak waasimeh kaadu firqawni uma malá kasaaraa kee finqa kaal akke waytek kalah kaah tekkem mali addunyaay akeeral
40:38: Kaadu yeemene num iyyeh; (firqawni buxah marih num kinnuk) yi-maraw yoo kataya missa-le gita siinih ascasseeh tirri sin haam keh
40:39: Yi-maraw addunyâ manó cagalah dago duyyê (afeynâ) baxay gaba kaltaay, diggaluk akeera is-waar dabqa
40:40: Addunyâ manol uma-taamá abe seehadaytii, toysa akeeral ma- galtima tet celta galtó akke waytek kaadu meqe taamá abe seehadayti labboowek hinnay sayyoowek usuk moomintuh anuk, toysa woo mari jannat cula Yalli kay addal cisab maliinoh ken arzaqhuk
40:41: Kaadu yi-maraw anu Yallal taamineeniih kay farmoyta Muusal taamineeniih girák naggowtaanamah sin seecak isin girá yoo culussu wayta taamâ fan yoo sectaanaa? Woh mannal takkeeh
40:42: Yallal koroositaah ixxiga kak aalle waam agleh kaat haamah yoh sectaanaah, anu mayso-leeh dambi cabti-le Yalla fan sin seeca
40:43: Nummaak isin cagalah qibaadáh fan yoo kak sectaanam qibaadâ seecó cakkisittam hinna addunyaay akeeral. kaadu diggah nek gacsimeyná Yalla fan takkeeh, diggah koroosannuu kee uma- taamát caddok tatura mari usun girâ mara
40:44: Toysa anu siinik axcem sarrah kassitettoonuuh edde nadaamitetton digaalá intih tablen waqdi, anu inni caagid Yallal kelsa, diggaluk Yalli isi naqoosah caalat yabali keenik iyye woo moominti
40:45: Tokkel Yalli uma-malay kaah malseenih digaalák (qidim kinnuk) kaa naggoyseeh, firqawnaa kee firqawni maral uma-digaalá obte badat ken xuumuse waqdi
40:46: Saakuuy carra digaaláh girál xayyowsimaanaah, firqawnaa kee firqawni mara digaalák gibdi digaalát culusa iyya Yalli malaykak
40:47: Girâ mari giráh addal keemaarita waqdi keenih cusey nabiyow, boola-le mari kaxxa mariinite marak diggah nanu sin kataata marah sugnek tohul isin girâ digaalák-tu nek maay kaltaanaah keenik iyyan
40:48: Kaxxa mariinite mari boola-le marak diggah nee kee sin inkih tet addal nanno ikkal digaalák- tu siinik kallam madudna iyyen, diggah Yalli nummah isi naqoosâ fan qadlil mekle
40:49: Kaadu giráh addal yan mari jahannam dacrissa malaykak sin Rabbi neh kallacay digaalák inki ayró neh xabbacoysam keh iyyen
40:50: Jahannam dacrissa Malayka keenik itteh; sin farmoytit baxxaqqa-le astooti luk siinih amaatuk ma- suginnaa? Yeey, neh yemeeteenih itta koros. Toysa nanu siinih makallacnak isin kallacita Yalla keenik itta malayka kaadu korós dooqá finga akke waytek tu-hinna
40:51: Diggah nanu catnah Ni- farmoytittee kee yeemene mara addunyâ manóo kee sumaq- mari (malaykaay, ambiyaa kee moominiin kinnuk) soola ayró (qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk)
40:52: Woo ayró daalimiinih ken tû- malkit tu-keenih xiqewaa ayró kaadu abaaró loonuuh, umá dabqa- lon akeeral
40:53: Yalli xiibitak nummah Nabii Muusah tirtó neceeh, israa-iil xaylo kitab (tawraat kinnuk) nagarsisne iyye
40:55: Toysa isbir nabiyow koros kot abta adál, diggah Yallih xagni nummak, kaadu isi dambik cabti esseritaay, isi-Rabbi saytunnoysak faylis carraa kee saaku
40:56: Diggah Yallih aayootal sinam giddiya mari keenih yemeete sumaq maliinoh ken alilwat kaxxa mariinok sah tanim matan, usun faxaanam ma-gufan (nabuwwannu kinnuk). Toysa Yalla maggansit nabiyow diggah Yalli usuk yaabbi, yabali kinnik
40:57: Yalli qaranwaa kee baaxót abe ginó sinaamat abe ginók nabah, kinnih immay woh sinaamak maggo mari ma-yaaxiga
40:58: Kaadu inti malii kee yable num ma-missowta, kaadu yeemeneeh meqe taamá abite maraa kee umeyniitiy uma-taamá abte ma- missowta, Sinaamey kassittaanam siinik dagoh
40:59: Diggah Qhiyaamah ayro amaate- le, tet mamut agay waaga mali, kinnih immay sinaamak maggo mari (koros kinnuk) tet mamut ma- nummaysa
40:60: Sin Rabbi Yoo kallaca iyye siinik oggoleyyok. diggaluk Yi-qibaadák kaxxamariinita mari buraay, qunxaané luk jahannam girá cule- lon
40:61: Yalla kinni bar siinih abtem kaat sabhalaltoonuh (tastiriicoonuh) kaadu laqó diifu siinih abe rizqhi gurantoh. diggah Yalli sinam amol kaxxa muxxó-li, kinnih immay sinaamak maggo mari Yalli keenih abe niqmatal Kaa ma-faatitan
40:62: Toh siinih abtem Yalla, sin Rabbi, ummaanim giné. Qibaadá cakkisita Yalli mayan kaak sah, toysa iimaanak mannal daggawtaanaah Yallak kalihim taqbuden waqdi
40:63: Tonnaah Yallih astooti angadduk suge mari iimaanak daggawsimak suge
40:64: Yalla kinni baaxó gub (madab) siinih abteeh, qaran amô tabsa siinih abtem. kaadu sin weeloyseeh, weeloolá sin yeymeeqeeh, rizqhik meqem siinih yecee. toh Yallaay sin Rabbi too niqgmootá siinih teceem, tohul Yallih kayrii kee muxxó maggoh, Usuk ginô Rabbi
40:65: Yalli usuk dudda-le manoy waarta- le, qibaadá cakkisita Yalli mayan kaak sah. toysa kaa kallaca qibaadá kaah caglisak, fayla-lem Yalla ginô Rabbi kinni
40:66: nabiyow Ixxic ; diggah anu waasimeh Yallak kalah taqbudeenim aqbudeemik, yi Rabbik baxxaqqooqi yoh temeete waqdiik wadir, kaadu amrisimeh ginô Rabbih rammitaah qibaadá kaah caglisaamal
40:67: Sinaamey Yalla kinni sin abba Aadam burtak gintem, lakal daacoyti tiffak kay samad gine, lakal dabloytak sin gine, lakal inâ baguk galaluh (alqih) anuk sin yayyaaqe, lakal maqar-le furrayniino guftaanam keh, lakal idoolá takkeenim keh kaadu Yalli wohuk naharat siinik qidam tanih kaadu muggaqsime waktiy qumri siinik gaba edde kala taafeeniih wohul kaskassoowa mara takkeenî gidah
40:68: Yalla kinni taynuwweeh qiddam. caagiidak caagidik teyna mekla waqdii, cagalah tohiimik tik iyyaah, edde luk takkeh
40:69: Nabiyow matablannaa korosuk Yallih aayootal sinam (Qhuraan kinnuk) giddiya mara, usun teetil yaamineenimik mannal daggawsimaanaah
40:70: Qhuraan kitab kee Ni-farmoytit edde rubnem dirabboyse marii korosuk, toysa ama dirabboysiyyih ellecabo sarrah aaxige-lon
40:71: Silsilootat ken gaboobi ken fillittet axawah anuk ibitte keenik edde debran waqdi, Malayka ken edde hirriigissah
40:72: Niqna kak caddok taturte leel ken hirriigisan, tohuk lakal giráh addal girá keenit ursan
40:73: Tohih lakal ken sahitak Yallat agleh haak aqbaduk sugten Yallitte annih teetiiy keenik iyyan
40:74: Yallak kalah aqbaduk sugten Yallitte sin maay catta asaaku? nek qelliteenih ken manabla hinnay inkinnah duma tu-yaqbude marah masuginnino iyyan.Yalli koros tama mara kah makkoysennaah makkoysah
40:75: Ama digaalá sin kah geytem baaxô bagul cakki maliinoh abak sugten wallitiyyaa kee batrah Yallih naqoosat abak sugten caddok taturih sabbata
40:76: Jahannam giráh afoofik cula tet addal waarak, tokkel manxu umaah kaxxamariino-leelah orbeyná
40:77: Toysa nabiyow isbir diggah Yallih xagni nummak, tokkel digaaláy ken kah xagnisnek tu-koo aybullee kee hinnay koo warrayse (raba kinnuk) akkenno ken digaallak naharat, toysa nee fan gacsime-lon qhiyaamah ayró
40:78: Nummah Yalli xiibitak iyyah; nabiyow kok naharat farmoytit rubneh, keenik xaagu kol kak maaqnem linooh, keenik xaagu kol kak maaqe waynem linoh, kaadu faxe farmoytah makkinna hebeltoh astá baaham Yallih idinih akke waytek, tokkel Yallih amri yamaate waqdi koros digaaláh meklá cakkıil tekke farmoytit kee ken dirabboyse marih fanat, tokkel baatilleelá finqitteh
40:79: Yalla kinni lac siinih abtem tu-kak feertaanaah, tu-kak takmeenim keh
40:80: Kaadu maggo tuxxiq kaat (lacat) litoonuh, kaadu alilwat liton caagiida edde taafeeniih kaa kee dawaanikit Quuka tassukuqqeenimkeh
40:81: Kaadu Yalli isi astooti sin yaybulleehik, tokkel Yallih astootik maa-astáay tangaddeenim
40:82: (Baaxô bagul magexinnoonuu keenik naharat suge marih ellecabo kah tekke inná yabloonuh? keenik naharat sugte ummatta loowoh Gxxuh) keenik magguk sugtech, qandee kee maqarah keenik gibduk sugte, kaadu baaxô bagul raatwah (xisoosah) keenik manguk sugte. Tokkel abak sugeenim keenih xiqtem mali Yallih digaalák
40:83: Tokkel ken farmoytit baxxaqqooqi- luk keenil temeete waqdi addunyâ qilmik ken garil taniimit yifriceeniih, elle anqasak sugen digaalá keenil obteeh, ken marteh (magaariyteh)
40:84: Tokkel Ni-digaalá yublen waqdi Yallal neemeneh Usuk inkittuh anuk kaadu qibaadál agleh Kaat haak suggu inneemil koroosinneh iyyen
40:85: Ni-digaalá yublen waqdi ken iimaan tu-keenih xiqa iimaan makko, tamah Yallih gitay Yalli fiirisey kay naqoosah addal tature kinni digaalá yablen waqdi ken iimaan tu-keenih anfiqewaam, tokkel koros finqitteh Ni -digaalá keenil obte waqdi
41:2: Ama-Qhuraanih oobiyyi fulte racmattaay gunê racmatta-le Yallih kabuk yekke
41:3: KĶKitaabay aayoota kak baxxaqsinte usuk Qhuraanay qarab-af yaaxige marah qarab afat yani kinni
41:4: A kitab (Qhuraan kitab kinnuk) yeemeneeh kaal taniimil taamite mara jannatal ayti-kumusa kaadu koroositeeh derre kaat cabe mara girál meesiisak yemeete tokkel maggo mari derre kaat cabeeh usun yaabbe mara hinnon
41:5: Koros Nabiik itteh; ni-sorkocô baxitte atu nee fan kak sectaamak alifut taniih ni-aytiitat gibda taniih nee kee ku-fanat reebi yan ku- seecó oggollaamak, toysa atu ku- diini koh yascasseemil taamit nanu diggah ni-diini neh yascasseemil taamitennok
41:6: Ixxic nabiyow:ama-korosuk cagalah anu sin innah yan seehadaytu kinniyo Yalli wacyi yol oobisam akke waytek, cagalah sin Yallay qibaadá cakkisita inki Yallay agleyta sinni, toysa Yalla fan sin gudduysu waa gita fan ufkunaay kaal soolaay dambi cabti kaal esserita, Yallat agleyta haytah tan korosuh finqi yan
41:7: Yalla inkittoysaanamat sinni nafsi saytunnoyse weeh Yalli ken kah amrise zaká aceewaa mara kaadu usun ellecaboh ayróy (qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk) ugut ayró kinnil koroosite mara kinnon
41:8: Diggah yeemeneeh meqe taamoomi abbaasite mari Yallah tet caglisak aggiriqqe sinni galtó-lon Yallih garil
41:9: Nabiyow A korosuk ixxic; diggah isin koroosittaanaa baaxó namma ayróh addat gine Rabbil kaadu agleytit kaat haytaanaa?woo Rabbi usuk ginô Rabbi kinnik
41:10: Kaadu tet bagul qaleelá daabiseeh tet kayri yeymeggeeh tet addal rizqhi cagguduseh mutuccutaamah dudda-le affara ayróy massowtah addat, essera marah
41:11: Tohuk lakat Yalli qaran ginuh qaran fan haysite, usuk (qaran kinnuk) qiirih anuk, tokkel Yalli qaran kee baaxók iyyeh; Yi-amri faxak oggola hinnay dirkih oggola, qaran kee baaxó itteh; ku-amri cinnam neh matakkaay ku-amri oggolleh
41:12: Tokkel malciná qaraanih ginók namma ayróh addat gabá kaleeh, kulli qaraanal-le amri oobise. Kaadu Addunyâ qaran ifa cutuukut bilqisne kaadu sheetoona qaraanak yab ankacissaah yab garaqtaamak dacayri tet (cutuk kinnuk) abne, woo ginóy qaxmeqe mayso-leeh ixxiga-le Rabbih caggudusiyyaa kee dudda kinni
41:13: Tokkel koros iimaanat derre cabtek, toysa keenik ixxic nabiyow; qaad kee samuud bayisse kakkaqóh innah tan kakkaqóh digaaláy sin saaxissak sin meesiisa
41:14: Farmoytit keenik fooca-le gambii kee keenik derre-le gambik keenih temeete waqdi Yallak sah tu- maqbudina axcuk, usun iyyeenih (koros kinnuk) ; Yalli faxinnay malayka farmoytiitih nel oobisak yen. Tokkel diggaluk nanu cinneeh koroositneh isin edde rubsummu itteenim
41:15: Qaadah (Nabii Huud mara kinnuk) tu-gactekii, tokkel baaxô bagul kaxxa-mariinitteh Yallih naqoosal cakki maliinoh, kaadu nek qandeh iyyi gibdii iyyen? Mayablaanaa! Diggah Yallay ken gine Usuk qandeh keenik gibdim? Kaadu usun Ni-astooti angadduk sugen
41:16: Tokkel kaxxa xabcaa kee kaxxa hawwugtó-le (harrugtó-le) caacay keenil rubne keenit umah tan ayroorat, addunyâ manol mayqanxa-le digaalá ken tammosnâ gidah, Akeerâ digaaláh tu-gactek, mayqanxah lafitak raqtaah, usun ken cattam malon
41:17: Kaadu Samuuduh tu-gactekii (Nabii Saalic mara kinnuk), cakki gita keenih baxxaqisneeh, intî sinná (makô gita) dooriten tirtô gitak, Tokkel kakkaqô digaaláy mayqanxa-le ken bayisse koroosannuu kee abak sugen uma taamah sabbatah
41:18: Kaadu qaad kee Samuud edde fingitte digaalák keenik yeemeneeh, Yallak meesitak suge mara naggosneh
41:19: Nabiyow kassis, Yallih naqboytit girá fan maagowsinta ayró naharsi mara keenik hirriigâ maral hooriyta Malayka
41:20: Usun jahannam giráh amoh yamaateeniih, sinni umaaneená yangadden waqdi, ken maabbaay (aytiita kinnuk), ken mabulwaay (Gntiita kinnuk), ken arooba (xagar kinnuk) keenil sumaaqitta addunyal abak sugen uma taamoomil
41:21: Kaadu Yallih naqboytit sinni aroobak (xagar kinnuk) macah nel sumaaqittaanaah iyyan. Ummaanim yaabisa Yalli nee yaabisa keenik itta ken arooba. Kaadu naharsi adda sin gintem kaa kinniih kaa fan gacsimtan rabteeniik lakal
41:22: Kaadu sinni qellisak masuginniton umaané abtan waqdi sin maabbaay, sin mabulwaay, sin arooba siinil sumaaqittaamih meesih, kinnih immay diggah Yalli abba haytaanamak maggom aaxige waam akkaluk sugten
41:23: Kaadu woh sin uma dareemuy sin bayiseeh, girá sin culsey sinni Rabbi edde daremteeni kinni, tokkel baxaysite marah maacissen
41:24: Tokkel digaalál coolaysiteenik (yisbireenik) girá keenik orbeynaay, toobah addunyâ madaara essereenik, usun woh kak oggolan mara hinnon keenik iyya Yalli
41:25: Kaadu keenih massosneh uma kataysiisiy addunyal uma taamá qaxa keenit bahsissey akeera ken hawweenisse, kaadu digaalâ maxcó keenil nımmatteeh madqimteh keenik naharat warrayte ummattâ luk ginni koros kee seehadâ korosuk. Diggah usun baxaysiteeh kasaarite marah sugen
41:26: Koroosite mari ama Qhuraan mankacsinaay werrek kaat (Nabii kinnuk) ixxica sittak iyyen; kaak tayseeniih Qhuraan kiraate cabamkeh
41:27: Toysa diggah korosuk ama yaabat yaabe mara gibdi digaalá ken tammoysenno, kaadu usun abak sugen uma taamál gacta galtóh ken galtenno akeeral
41:28: Woh ken kah geytem Yallih naqboytiitih galtó girá tekkeemih sabbata, tet addal waara dabqa-lon addunyal Ni-aayoota angadduk sugeenimih galtóh
41:29: Kaadu koroosite mari giráh addal anuk iyyeh; Ni-Rabbow ginnii kee seehadak nee makkoyse nammay nee uybulluy, ken nammay ninni ibitteh gubat haynaah, girák guba raaqa mara yakkeenî gidah
41:30: Diggah ni-Rabbi Yalla iyye maray, lakal tohul soolel, malayka keenil obta rabi keenih yamaate waqdi, ma-meesitinaay, ma-rookitinaay, ayti-kibbi haysa elle xagnisinten jannatih culimil keenik axcuk
41:31: Nanu sin awlaytiiti addunyâ manoo kee akeeral, kaadu Jannat addal sin nafsi faxxa haam litoonuuh, kay addal esserri haytaanam liton keenik itta malayka
41:32: Woh dambi siinih cabaah, nacrur siinih-le Rabbik tan qibnaytiinó kinni
41:33: Kaadu maxcóh iyyi yayseeh, Yallih inkittinaanee kee Kay qibaadá fan sinaamah seecaah, meqe taama aba numuy diggah anu muslimiinik numuk teyna kinniyo iyyak. (num mayaysa)
41:34: Maqaanée kee umaané ma- massowtak umaané kol baaheh yan numih umaané xiq (qursus) kee qafuuy meqem kaah abtaamat gutuq, toysa koo kee fanat umaané kak tan num diggah kacanuh xayi kataysah inna koh akke-le
41:35: Kaadu umaané maqaanét gutqaanam matantacawwimaay mageytimta kaxxa sabri-le marah akke waytek kaadu is matantacawwimaay mageytimta kaxxa saamii kee galtó-le numuh akke waytek addunyaa kee akeeral
41:36: Kaadu sheetanak tan muknoonaa kee waswasa tayse tiyay kah amrisintek koo maktek toysa Yalla kaak maggansit kaa (sheetan kinnuk) kok waaselek, diggah Yalli yaabbi, yaaxigi
41:37: Yallih astootik kay inkittinaanee kee kay dudda tascasseemik tanim, bar kee laqóoy, ayróo kee alsá, Ayróh ma-kummaatinaay, alsáh ma-kummaatinay ken gineh yan Yallah kummaata cagalah, nummah kaa yaqbude mara tekkeenik
41:38: Tokkel ama-koros Yallah sujuud abtaamak kaxxa-mariinittek yanoonay ken ixxic nabiyow; ku- Rabbih xaqul tan Malayka baraay laqó kaa saytunnossaah usun wohuk mataqban
41:39: Kaadu kay astootik kay inkittinaanee kee kay dudda tascaseemik tanim, diggaluk atu baaxó qabaarah kafah tet table, tokkel lee (rob) teetil oobisna waqdi tangayyeeh ufyuttaah fayya itta, diggah rabteek gamadal tet yaynuwwee Rabbi rabtem yaynuwweemih dudda-le, diggah Yalli ummaan iimih qamal geyto-li kinni
41:40: Diggah Ni-aayootak daggaawaah koroosita mari, ken caagiida nek maqellitta. Girát gasyima num yayse innaa? Hinnay qhiyaamah ayró amaanah yamaate num yayseeh? A-ķkorosey faxxa hayteenim abita, diggah Yalli abba haytaanam yabali kinnik
41:41: Diggah Qhuraan keenih yemeete waqdi kaal koroositeeh, yengedde mari, wohul diggalsime-le. Diggah a-Qhuraan Yalli kaa yiysiiseeh, mayso-le kitab kinni
41:42: Baatil fooca-le gambik kaat mayamaataay, derre-le gambik kaat mayamaataay, usuk tu-kaat ossaanaah tu-kaak daggoysaanamak daccarsime kitab kinni, Yallay fayla leeh naggaarah yanih kabuk obsimeemih sabbatah
41:43: Nabiyow ama koros kok ittam mali kok naharat temeete farmoytiitik iyyeenim akke waytek, diggah ku- Rabbi dambi cabtiliiy, qansarissa digaalá-li
41:44: Nabiyow ama Qhuraan “Qajam”afat (Qarab-af akke waa afat) kaa haynaamal, aayoota kaak macah baxxaqsime wayteeh ni- afat? Qhuraan qajamaay, Nabii qarabtoytaa? Axcuk yenen. Keenik ixxic nabiyow; ama Qhuraan yeemene marah tirtooy, diwá. Kaadu kaa nummaysewee marak aytiital gibda keenik taniih, usuk (Qhuraan kinnuk) ken sorkocô baxittel inti sinnaay diteey, tirri kaal miyyan. Woo korosuy Qhuraan nummayse wayte, xer- ikkek kah seecan maray ken kah seecaanam aabbe waah inna kinni
41:45: Yalli xiibitak iyyah; Muusah kitab neceeh koh kah necee innah, tokkel kay mari itta kaal weeh. Ku-Rabbik tookome qangará suge wannay ken fan meklimak yen addunyal elle, kaadu diggah usun Qhuraanak shakkiiy, gibdi agay- waagat yanin
41:46: Maqaané abita num isi nafsih abitaah, umaané aba num isi nafsil abaah, ku-Rabbi naqoosa yadlumi hinna
41:47: Qhiyaamá edde takke waktih ixxiga Yalla fan gacsimta. Kaadu le-qoxxittek (sibaabik/faanittek) yawqe mexexi mayanaay, say- tiyay tassukuqqeeh xalta matan kay ixxigal akke waytek. Kaadu Yot agleh haak sugten agleytit annih teetiiy, keenik axcuk keenih seecuwaa ayró, koros ittah ; “asaaku koo naysixxigeh atu agleyta litoomuh sumaaqita num net aneewaam”
41:48: Kaadu keenik bayteh duma addunyal Yallak kallah aqbaduk sugeenim, tokkel usun kudaanaah, eleelitan rike aalle waanam yismiteenih Yallih digaalák
41:49: Seehadayti mataqba (manakura) isi Rabbit addunyâ maqaaneh guranah xaqtimaamak, kaadu umaané (tuddagnaay, biyaakaay, ....) kaa xagtek, toysa usuk (korosta kinnuk) yabboodiiy yaggiriqqi kinni Yallih racmatak
41:50: Kaadu nummaak Nek tan maqaané kaa tammosnek (korosta kinnuk) gibdaabini kaa xageek lakat, diggaluk ah-yiimiy yi-angoyyal geeh, qhiyaamá uguttam makkala. kaadu yi-Rabbi fan gace yoo tekkek anu diggaluk Kay xaqul Jannat liyo axcele. Tokkel diggaluk koroosite marah warsenno umaanek abeenim, kaadu diggaluk ken tammoysenno gibdi digaalá
41:51: Kaadu seehadaytuh qaafiyat kee gaddaliinot namqe waqdi, derre cabaah, kaxxa-mariinoh moyya karerri haa cakkih rammitaamak, kaadu umaané kaa xagta waqdi tokkel usuk kaxxa xaaqó-li yakke
41:52: Nabiyow a-korosuk ixxic; yoh warisay a-Qhuraan Yallih garik yen kaa tekkeeh, lakat kaal koroositteeniih dirabbosseenik, siinik makot gexoh iyyi gacaa?, cakki kaxxa akaalafah tekeelefeeniih cinten waqdi? (num magaca)
41:53: A-koros Ni-astooti aybullenno qaran kee baaxô deraafeey, ken nafsittel, Qhuraan cakki kinnim keenih baxxaqqa ittam fanah. Kaadu ku-Rabbik ken maxiqtaa astáh, Qhuraan cakki kinniih diggah usuk kulliimil sumaaqitam
41:54: Oobbiyooy! Diggah usun (koros kinnuk) sinni Rabbih angaarawak agay-waagat yanin? Oobbiyooy! diggah Yalli ummaanim marot yabbixe ixxigaa kee duddal, kaak qellittam matan. Fulte Racmattaay, Gunê Racmatta le Yallih Migaaqal Qimbisa
42:3: Nabiyow Yallay mayso leeh naggaarinnu-le ama Qhuraan wacyih kol kah oobise innah kok duma sugte ambiyal kitooba oobise
42:4: Qaranwaay, baaxól enni ittam Yalli-le kaadu usuk fayyaliiy, nabna-li
42:5: Qaranwa ittak amol faqittaamat xayyossu hayte Yallih nabnak abta meesih sabbatah, malayka sinni Rabbi saytunnoysak faylissa, kaadu moominiinik baaxól yan marah dambi cabti esserta Yallal, oobbiyooy! Diggaluk Yalli usuk dambi cabti-li, xuwaw-li
42:6: Yallak kalah yallitteeta awlah haysite marih abtootat Yalli loynah yaniih, nabiyow atu ken abtoota (caabi) dacrisé hinnito atu meesiisê kal
42:7: Tonnaah kok naharsi farmoytiitil wacyi kah oobisne innah Qhuraanay Qarab afat yani wacyih kol oobisne nabiyow makki maraa kee seehadak tet deraafel tanim edde meesissâ gidah kaadu gaaboynah ayróy (qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk) mamut kak waaga sinnih digaalál sinam mceesissâå gidah. Seehada namma buttah kurrunta: buttá jannatal gactaah (moominiin kinnuk) buttá saqiir deqsitta giral gacta (koros kinnuk)
42:8: Yalli faxinnay seehada inkih inki mara abak yeneeh islaam diinil tirri ken haak yen, kinnih immay Yalli isi ginók isih faxa mara isi racmatat culsaah (moominiin kinnuk) daalimiin (koros kinnuk) awlaytu maliiy, Yallih digaalák cateyna mali qhiyaamah ayró
42:9: Hinnak a koros Yallak kalah awla haysittee? Yalli usuk dibuk cakki awlaytuuy, usuk rabtem yaynuwwe kaadu usuk ummaanimil dudda-le
42:10: Sinaamey tuk itta elle wayya haytaanamih cokmi Yalla fanah gaca. Toh Yallaay, yi-Rabbiy elle kelta kinniih, Kaa fanah aduure (andabbe) keenik ixxic nabiyow
42:11: Yalli qaranwaa kee baaxó giné, sinaamey sin nafsik agabu siinih abeeh, lacak labim kee sayim siinih abe edde sin yaydarruh, tu Kay ceelo maliiy kaa celtam matan, Usuk yaabbiiy yabali
42:12: Qaranwaa kee baaxô reedá Yalli leeh, racmat kee rizqhi mafaatic kay gabal yan, isih kah faxa marah rizqhi farakka haah, isih kah faxa maral ceyissi haa, Usuk diggaluk ummaanimil ixxiga-li
42:13: Yalli siinih madqeh diinik Nuuc edde farriimeemiiy, nabiyow wacyih kol oobisneemiiy, Kaadu Ibraahimiiy, Muusaay, Qiisa edde farrimnem, islaam diini soolisaay kaal mabaxaa-baxsimina iyyaanama, nabiyow ken fan kak secta diini Yallat agleyta haal yembeh, Yalli isi inkittinaane fanah isih faxa mara doora isi ginók kaadu isil yaduure mara tirri haa
