76:21: Anxaxin saray xabcin cariirik yanii kee gibdi cariirik yan sari ken xagaral yaniih, qado lakqok tan gabâ biriitat (cagooluk) billiiman, kaadu ken Rabbi yaaqubeenimiy saytuniy taahirik tanik ken yafqe
76:22: Diggah ta galtó sin meqe taamoomih galto kinniih, sin taamoomi addunyal yalli raabiteeh yikcineh yan taamak sugte keenik iyyan
76:23: Diggah Nabiyow Qhuraan oobisiyyah nanu ninnih kol oobisne
76:24: Nabiyow Ku Rabbih meklal isbiraay, korosuk dambit kaxaxah yan marih yab moggolinaay hinnay koroosannuu kee maxqawitit caddok tatreh yan marih yab moggolin
76:25: Kaadu ku Rabbih migaq Carraay, saaku xag
76:26: Kaadu barak tut kaah kummaataay, barak xer waktit salat kaah ab
76:27: Diggah tama mari (koros kinnuk) sissik tiya (addunya kinnuk) kicnoonuuh, qilsi ayroy ellecabol ken qambalta cabaanah (Qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk)
76:28: Nanu ken ginneeh gino keenik karriqqi hayne, kaadu nanu bayisnam fannek, bayissi ken hayneh ken innah yan maray kayrih keenik yayse ciggiilisiyyah ciggiilisenno
76:29: Diggah tama suurá seehadah kassiisi, toysa isi nafsih maqaané faxe num, isi Rabbih gita yabbixe, iimaan kee meqe taamál
76:30: Isin caagiidak hebeltô caagidiy faxxaana manton, Yalli faxeh akķke waytek, diggah Yalli isi ginô caaloota yaaxigi, abba haamal naggaar kinni
76:31: Yalli isi naqoosak isih faxe mara isi Racmat (jannat kinnuk) culsa, kaadu daalimiinih (koros kinnuk) akeeral qansarissa digaalá massoyse
77:1: Yalli ittâ lakleh itta kataata caacayal xiibite
77:2: Edde luk gibdi caacayay hawwug iyyal xiibite
77:3: Kaadu yalli malaykay qubulta usuk faxa ikke beytay fixiixisiyyah kaa fixiixissal xiibite
77:4: Edde luk yalli malaykay cakkii kee deedalaay, calaalii kee caraamu ittak baxissam kay xaquk luk obtal xiibite
77:5: Edde luk malaykay wacyi Yallih ambiyaa kee farmoytiitil oobissal xiibite
77:6: Seehada Yallal malkit geewaytuh hinnay meesisso keenih yakkuh Yallih digaalák
77:7: Cagalah Qhiyaamâ caagidik isin elle xagnisinteenim akkelem Raqmali
77:8: Tokkel Cutuk duugumaah diifi kak gexa waqdi
77:11: Kaadu Yallih farmoytit kee ken ummattâ fanat mekla edde aban wakti muggaqsime waqdi
77:13: Ginô fan edde meklaanaah edde Baxsan ayró, kah xagnisimeenim (woh Qhiyaamah ayró)
77:14: Kaadu seehadaytow maca koo tiysixxigeeh Baxsi ayroó kee tet gibdaabini kinnim
77:15: Qhiyaamah ayro dirabboyse marah woo ayro fingi yan
77:16: Naharsi marak Yallih farmoytit dirabboyse mara mafinqisinninoo
77:17: Tohuk lakal wadirsi mara ken kataysenno
77:19: Yallih inkittinaanee dirabboyse marah woo ayro (Qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk) finqi yan
77:20: Seehaday boola le leek (daacoyta kinnuk) Sin ma gininninoo
77:21: Edde luk sabhalal leeh dacayri le aracay (saynumih maxax kinnuk) bica let kaa ma hanninoo
77:23: tokkel kaa ginnam dudneeh, yayse dudda lem nee
77:24: Ni dudda dirabboysa marah woo ayro Finqi yan
77:25: Baaxó aracay inkih sin yasgalleeh yabbixe maabinninoo
77:27: Kaadu fayyale qaleelá teetil mahanninoo diggi tet haytuh, kaadu coboy leey salfa lek sin mafqinninoo
77:28: Ni niqmat yangaddee marah woo ayro Finqi yan
77:29: Korosuk qhiyaamah ayró: jahannam giráh digaaláy dirabboysak sugteenî fanah gexa keenik iyyan
77:30: Gexaay iraawita jahannam giráh qiiriy sidiica luddalê fanah
77:31: Usuk Ma silaalisaay, giráh huurik xiqam malik
77:32: Diggah is kaxxa qarih gide yakke xinkilliq qambissa
77:33: Usuk (xinkilliq kinnuk) Dat caawin gaala ceela
77:34: Yallih meesisso dirabboyse marah woo ayro Finqi yan
77:35: Ta ayró dirableelá yabtaamih dudda mali. (Qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk)
77:36: Yaabaanamih idni keenih mayantacawwima edde yawqoonuh
77:37: Tama ayro dirabboysa marah woo ayro Finqi yan
77:38: Qhiyaamah ayró korosuk iyyaanah: tah ginô fan edde meklaanaah baxsan ayró, sin kee naharsi mara edde gaabosneh
77:39: Toysa Isin malá teelleenik, yi digaalak edde cattimtoonuh yoh malsita
77:40: Ellecaboh ayro dirabboysa marah woo ayro Finqi yan
77:41: Diggah Yallak meesite mari jannatal silalwaa kee daroorih addal yan
77:42: Kaadu caxâ mixuk faxxa haanamih addal yanin
77:43: Keenik iyyaanah: akumaay aquba rufto luk, addunyal abbaasitten meqe taamah sabbatah
77:44: Diggah nanu tonnal galatna meqem abite mara.(moominiin kinnuk)
77:45: Jannatti niqmat dirabboyse marah woo ayro Finqi yan
77:46: Yalli korosuk iyyah: addunyal meqem akumaay dago wakti teetit hataka diggah isin umeyniitik, Yallat agleyta hayteenimih sabbatah
77:47: Cisab kee galtoh ayro dirabboyse marah woo ayro Finqi yan
77:48: Kaadu Yallah salat abaay kaah rammita keenik iyyeenik, salat kaah maabaanaay, kaah marammitan
77:49: Yallih aayoota dirabboyse marah woo ayro Finqi yan
77:50: Toysa ta qhuraanay Yallih yab kinnih iyyal aamine weenik, maakitaabaay, maayaabaay kaak wadir elle yaaminoonu waanam
78:2: Itta essertam naba xaagu. (woh qhuraan kee sooloh ayró)
78:3: Woh usun itta elle waan xaagu
78:8: Kaadu namma qaynatah sin ma gininnoo? (labim kee sayiimih anuk)
78:9: Kaadu sin xin sin xagarih raacat (rofto) maabinninoo
78:10: Kaadu bar sartan ma abinninoo? (kay ditet)
78:11: Kaadu laqó quusi edde gurrussan wakti siinih maabinninoo
78:12: Kaadu digga le malciin sin amol maxisinninoo? (malcina qaran kinnuk)
78:13: Kaadu ayro ifoytay hadiidigay cuumi le maabinninoo
78:15: Amboo kee baaxók ubukku ittam teetit nayyaaquh
78:17: Diggah, baxsi ayroy ginô fan edde baxsaana yimixxige wakti yekke. (qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk)
78:18: Baanta fuxsinta ayró butta buttah anuk tamaaten. (woh Qhiyaamah ayró)
78:19: Kaadu qaran fakkiimaah, afoofi yakke ayró malaykah obtih
78:20: Kaadu qaleelá gexsimtaah edde bakarbakar takke
78:21: Digga luk jahannam girá woo saaku koroosite mara aracal qambalta gira tekke
78:22: Is caddok taturleelah elle gaceyná tekke.( koros kinnuk)
78:23: Usun Tet addal amurruqe wayta liggiditte daffeya maráh anuk
78:24: Tet addal xabcaay, aqubbu haanam matammoysan
78:25: Nabam niqni lee kee girâ marih qasaalayi akke waytek
78:26: Tamah keenih taguude galtó kinni. (ken uma taamák gexaak)
78:27: Diggah, usun fokkaaqok (cisaabak) meesitak suge weenimih sabbatah
78:28: Kaadu ni aayoota dirabboysiyyah dirabboyseenimih sabbatah
78:30: Toysa Tammoysa! Siinih osisnam mannu digaalák sa keenik iyyan
78:31: Diggah Yallak meesita mari asallam le.(limayeenih)
78:33: Kaadu kaqoona ley fooduh tani lon.(inki qumri le lon)
78:34: Kaadu galoosay gocoyuk kibuk tani lon
78:35: Kay addal deedal maxcoo kee dirabboysiyyak tu mayaabban
78:36: Tamah ku Rabbik galtoo kee acway dudda le kinni
78:37: Qaranwaa kee baaxooy, ken nammayih fanal enni ittaamih Rabbiy fulte Racmatta le.Kaâ luk yaabaanamih dudda lem matana
78:38: Jibriil kee malayka saffih gacca ittah solta ayro, num keenik mayaaba racmaan kinni Rabbi idini kah yeceeh cakkit yaabá num akke waytek
78:39: Toh nummah ayróy raq sinni, toysa Ellecabô maqaane isi nafsih faxe num isi Rabbî fanah madaara yaallay iimaan kee meqe taamáh abittol
78:40: Diggah nanu xayi digaalál sin meesisneh, seehadayti kay namma gaba tuysukumem yable ayróy, korosti maganey burtá akkinniyoy edde iyyak
79:1: Yalli koros roocitte gibdi siibiyyah siibta malaykal xiibite
79:2: Kaadu moominiin roocitte caalih tayyaaqe malaykal xiibite
79:3: Kaadu yalli giiruh giirissa malaykay Yallih amrih wacyi oobissaah tayyaaqel xiibite
79:4: Kaadu yalli qalaylih qalalta malaykay Yallih amri tagdabuh qalaltal xiibite
79:5: Kaadu Yalli isi amri bicissaah tagdube malaykal xiibite
79:6: Tangayyi (Baaxo kinnuk) tangayyeh tan ayróy gino inkih edde rabta (toh naharsi baantá fuxsunta ayró kinnuk)
79:7: Nammey haytô baantá teetil katayta (toh ummaanim edde tanuwweeh edde ugutta baantá)
79:10: diggah nee innaa gacsimelem Rabneek lakal nuwwuk addunyâ manoh iyyan
79:11: Rumutte lafoofi tikki inneek lakalaa addunyah gacsinnam
79:12: Is toysa baxaysitteeh, kasaaritte madaara iyyen
79:13: Cagalah is ugut baanatah inki xongoló kinni
79:14: Tokkel usun inkih saahira deqsitta baaxol nuwwwuk gaabowan (woh Qhiyaamah ayro kinnuk)
79:15: Nabiyow Nabii Muusâ xaagi kol yemeetee
79:16: Kay Rabbi saytunnoowe daqaaray Tuwa degqsital kaah seece waqdi
79:17: Firqawnâ fanah gex, diggah usuk caddok tatrehik kaak axcuk
79:18: Kaadu kaak ixxic: dambik saytunnowtaamih sangel maay litoo
79:19: Kaadu ku Rabbih inkittinaanee kee kay taaqat edde yanim koh ascassoo kaak meesita num takkemkeh
79:20: Edde luk Nabii Muusa kaxxa astá kaa yuybulle
79:21: Edde luk firqawni kaa dirabboyseeh cineh
79:22: Tohuk lakal iimaanat derre cabeeh sissikuk gexe
79:24: Anu sin Rabbiy inkih daga Raaqa kinniyo iyye
79:25: Edde luk Yalli kaa digaaleh ellecaboh iyye maxcoo kee naharsi maxcol
79:26: Diggah, firqawnaa kee digaalak kaa geyteemil Yallak meesita marah elle kaskassoowaanam edde tan
79:27: Sinaamey ginoh gibduk raqtam siini innaa? hinnak qaranaay?xisoh kaa xisek
79:28: Kay amo fayya heeh kaa massoyseh
79:29: Kaadu kay bar dattoyseeh, kay laqó ayrô diifut yeyyeeqe
79:30: Kaadu baaxó tohih lakal tet fidseh
79:31: Teetik lee kee num kee lac akummu haytam teetik yeyyeeqe
79:34: Tokkel qhiyaamaa kee Kaxxa gibda tamaate waqdi. (woh nammay haytó baanta kinnuk)
79:35: Toh Num abba heem edde kassita ayró
79:36: Kaadu jaciim deqsitta girá yaybulleen saaku yable marah
79:37: Tokkel yallih amrih cinat caddok tatre numuh tugactek
79:38: Kaadu akeerak addunyâ mano muxxuse num
79:39: Toysa diggah Jaciim deqsitta girá is kay orbeyná
79:40: Kaadu Isi Rabbih foocih soolok meesiteeh, isi nafsi umaanê fayxik waase numuh tugactek
79:41: Toysa diggah jannat usuk kay orbeyná
79:42: Nabiyow Koros qhiyaamak soltima ma waqdiiy axcuk koo esserta
79:43: Atu tet ixxigak litom mantu tet keenih warissuh
79:44: Tet ixxigá cagalah ku Rabbit taade
79:45: Cagalah atu teetik meesita mara meesiise (kade) kinnito
79:46: Diggah usun tet yablen ayró, addunya manol carraa kee hinnay saakuk sa tu suge wee marih innah gacca iyyan
80:1: Nabii Fooca ribbi heeh derre cabe
80:3: Nabiyow maca koo tiysixxigeeh usuk kok bartah yaniimit dambik saytunnoowa way
80:4: Hinnay kassitaah, woo kassit kaa yanfiqe way
80:6: Tokkel Atu kaat tafkuneeh, kaat agxitta
80:7: Kol tanim matan usuk aaminewaah saytunnoowe waamah
80:9: Usuk Yallak meesitak. (woh inti mali kinnuk)
80:10: Tokkel Atu kaak kalih marat agxitta
80:11: Nabiyow atu kah abtenna hinna, diggah is kassiisi
80:12: Tokkel faxa num kaa kasah. (Qhuraan kinnuk)
80:13: Yalli yeynebe kitoobah addal yan. (woh Qhuraanay lowcal macfuuzul yani kinni)
80:14: Is fayya le arac leeh saytunnowteh
80:18: Yalli macak kaa ginee naharsi adda
80:19: Tiffoytak (daacoytak) kaa gineeh ranko rankoh kaa caddoddoyseh
80:20: Tohuk lakal gita kaah xabbacoyseh. (woh inâ bagih mawqa kinnik)
80:21: Tohuk lakal kaa qidaah edde kaa yaaguqen magaq kaah abé.(woh kabri)
80:22: Tohuk lakal Yalli isih faxa waqdi kaa ugsa qhiyaamah ayró
80:23: Tonna hinnay nummah (guddunuh) Yalli kaak abá iyyeemiy kaa kah amrise maabinna
80:24: Tokkel Seehadayti isi maaqô fanah cubbi luk wagitay
80:25: Diggah nanu lee cayxih caxne qamburrek
80:32: Sin kee sin lacah tuxxiq takkê gideh
80:33: Tokkel Qaddik tan xongoloy ayti waysissa tamaate waqdi. (qhħiyaamâ xongolo kinnuk)
80:34: Too ayró num isi toobokoytak kuda
80:35: Kaadu isi inaa kee isi abbak kuda
80:36: Kaadu isi barra kee isi xaylok kuda
80:37: Woo saaku ummaan num keenik ise duddu haa caagidiy edde agxita le
80:38: Too ayró meqe marih foocitte iftah
80:40: Kaadu woo saaku uma marih foocittel obol yan
80:42: Woo mari usun gibdi korosuvy, gibdi umeyniiti
81:1: Ayró xambaqsintaah diifi teetik kata waqdi
81:3: Kaadu qaleelá baaxô baguk gexsimtaah foyya takke waqdi
81:4: Kaadu tabuni gaali loynamalita waqdi. (idqa gaalá kinnuk)
81:5: Kaadu dubaali wariggâ gibdah gaaboysima waqdi
81:6: Kaadu badwa giráh innah ursumta wagqdi
81:7: Kaadu nafsitte ise celtaamat xibbansinta waqdi. (woh meqe mara meqe marâ luk, uma mara uma marâ luk massoysan waqdi)
81:8: Kaadu nuwwih yoogoqen awká esserinta waqdi
81:10: Kaadu aben taamá elle tan kitooba xayyoysintaah, fakkimta waqdi
81:12: Kaadu jaciim deqsitta girá ursuntaah, hadiidigsinta waqdi
81:13: Kaadu jannat Yallak meesita marah xayyoysima waqdi
81:14: Too waqdi, nafsi maqaanek hinnay umaanek xayoysitem yaaxigeh
81:15: Yalli laqó ifi kak qellita cutuukal xiibite
81:16: Gexxa cutuukay isi aroocat qellittal xiibite
81:17: Kaadu bari dité baaha waqdil xiibite
81:18: Kaadu maaci diifu baaha waqdil xiibite
81:19: Diggah qhuraan massâ kaxxa le farmoytih (jibriil kinnuk) maxca
81:20: Usuk (Jibriil kinnuk) caylaleeh fayya le arac le, qarshi le rabbih xaqul
81:21: Wokkel malayka kaa oggoltaah, wacyil amaanat le
81:22: Kaadu sin kataysa (Nabii kinnuk) cabuli akke waamal xiibite
81:23: Nummah Nabii jibriil, Yalli kaa edde gine weelot ayro mawqa le gambik baxxaqqa le ikkel kaa yuble
81:24: Usuk (Nabii kinnuk) wacyi gudduysiyyal cillaaleli hinna. (cinnaane li/gabâ gibda li)
81:25: Kaadu ta Qhuraan Yallih Racmatak xiiriyime sheetaanih maxca hinna
81:27: Usuk (Qhuraan kinnuk) gersim hinna, Yallak kassiisih insii kee jinnih oobe kitab akke waytek
81:28: Siinik cakkii kee iimaanal soolam faxah yan numuh kassiisi
81:29: Isin faxxaanam matakka Yallay ginô Rabbih yani faxah akke waytek
82:3: Kaadu badwa sittal tanfuxxukumeeh, sittat tangale wagqdi
82:4: Magooqa fokkaqsimtaah addat sugtem iró ciggilsinta waqdi
82:5: Woo waqdi ummaan nafsi yaaxigeh yuysukumem kee udurrusem taamak
82:6: Kee seehadaytow maca koo duquurussaah ku Rabbiy cinda lek
82:7: Kaay koo gineeh, koo massoyseeh soolo koo yeymeeqe
82:8: Isih faxxa hee weelol koo bicseeh gine
82:9: Tonna hinnay, a korosey isin nummah gital matanin galtoh ayró dirabbossaana ikkalah
82:10: Diggah, sin dacrissa malayka dacayrih siinit tan
82:11: Yallih garil massakaxxa le kutbe abta malayka sin taama dacrissam
82:13: Diggah meqe mari jannatal yalli keenih yeceeh yan niqmatat yan
82:14: Kaadu diggah umam aba mari (koros kinnuk) Jaciim deqsitta girah addal yan
82:15: Usun galtoh ayró (Qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk) tet culan
82:16: Kaadu usun teetik cerrita mara hinnon (inkinnah teetik mayawqan)
82:17: Kaadu maca koo tiysixxigeeh galtoh ayró kinnim
82:18: Tohuk lakal maca koo tiysixxigeeh, galtoh ayró kinnim
82:19: Woh ayroy nafsi nafsih tu edde xiqe waah, woo saaku amri Yalli le
83:1: Keexoo kee midaan daggoysa marah finqaa kee digaala tan
83:2: Usun Sinaamak keexitan waqdi dudsuta mara keexoo kee midaan
83:3: Kaadu usun sinaamah keexeenik hinnay sinaamah miidaanise yakken waqdi daggoysaanah
83:4: Woo mari diggah sinni magooqak ugtoonu waanam Mayasmitaanaa
83:6: Woh sinam ginô Rabbih foocal soltu wayta ayró cisab kee galtoh
83:7: Nummah asmatah! umá marih kitab baaxok gubal sijjiin deqsita aracay ceya lel yan
83:9: Kitaabay yunkuttubey gaba kak kaleeni kinni
83:10: Woo ayró finqi yan dirabboysa marah
83:11: Woh galtoh ayró (Qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk) dirabboysa mara
83:12: Kaadu tet dirabbossam matan, ummaan caddok taturliy maggo dambilih yani akke waytek
83:13: Ni Qhuraanih aayoota kaal yakriyen waqdi naharsi marih hayyayoonay tunkuttube iyye
83:14: Tonna hinnay usuk Yallih kitaabâ ikkal, usun abak sugen uma taamoomi (dambi kinnuk) ken sorkocobaxitte buulteh Qhuraan nummaysaanamak
83:15: Wonna hinnay diggah, usun (koros kinnuk) woo ayro (Qhiyaamah ayro kinnuk) sinni Rabbik rebsimaanaah kaa mayablan
83:16: Tohuk lakal diggah, usun jaciim deqsitta girá cula mara kinnon
83:17: Tohuk lakal: tah woo girah digaalay isin dirabboysak sugteeni keenik iyyan
83:18: Nummah digga luk meqe marih (moominiin kinnuk) kitab jannatak fayya le aracay Qilliyyiin deqsital yan
83:20: Woh kitaabay yunkuttubeeh, gaba kak kaleeni kinni
83:21: Yalli xayyoyseh yan malayka kaah sumaaqitta
83:22: Diggah meqe mari jannatal yalli keenih yeceeh yan niqmatat yan
83:23: Sinni Rabbii kee usuk keenih massoyseemî fan Qaraakiy amok wagtan
83:24: Niqmatat yaniinim keenik ken foocitteh wir kee nooril taaxige
83:25: Liyyuk yan gocoyuy alifut yanik Ken yafqen
83:26: Ellecabo kak miski suruylek, woo Niqmatih geytoh qalala mari qalalay
83:27: Kaadu tasniim deqsitta darak tu kaat yasgalleen (daragu kinnuk)
83:28: Is (tasniim kinnuk) jannatti daray Yalli xayyoyseh yan mari kak yaaqube kinni
83:29: Diggah, isi taama yoysomme mari (koros kinnuk), yeemene maral asaaluk sugen addunyal anqasah
83:30: Kaadu keenil dardaran (xaqxaqan) waqdi, intiitaa kee miniina sittah casak sugen keenit aban anqasah
83:31: Kaadu sinni marâ fanah yandabben waqdi, sattaluk andabbuk sugen moominiinit aben xagaa kee anqasah
83:32: Kaadu moominiin yablen waqdi, diggah a mari makkoote mara axcuk sugen
83:33: Kaadu ama koros moominiin dacrisa marah anuk ma rubsuminnon
83:34: Edde luk Qhiyaamah ayro, yeemene mari korosul yasuuleeh, anqasah
83:35: Sinni Rabbii kee usuk keenih massoyseemî fan Qaraakiy amok wagtan jannatal
83:36: Koros addunyal abak sugte umaaneenaa kee dambittel galtimtee? Yeey, dudda le galtoh galtimte
84:2: Kaadu isi Rabbih ayti yaceeh, kay amri oggolam cakkik kaal tan
84:3: Kaadu baaxó fidsimtaah, farakka itta waqdi
84:4: Kaadu tet addat tanim qambissaah, foyyah kak raqta
84:5: Kaadu isi Rabbih ayti taceeh, kay amri oggoltam cakkik teetil tan
84:6: Kee ta seehadaytow diggah, atu isi Rabbî fanah gexxaah , meqe taama abtek hinnay uma taama abtek, tokkel atu qhiyaamah ayró kaat angoorewettooh abteemil koo galte le
84:7: Tokkel Le kitab migdak kah yontocowwime numuh tu gactek, (moomintu kinnuk)
84:8: Toysa Sahalik tan fokkaaqoh (cisab kinnuk fokkaaqime le sarriinoh)
84:9: Kaadu isi marâ fanah wallitak yandabbe.(jannatal)
84:10: Kaadu Le kitab kay xiiroonih derrek kah yontocowwime numuh tu gactek,(korosta kinnuk)
84:11: Toysa Sarriinoh finqaa kee baatih deerise le (seece le)
84:12: Urta girá culele tet niqna tammoysuh
84:13: Diggah usuk addunyal isi marih addal wallitak suge
84:14: Diggah usuk isi Rabbî fanah inkinnah aduure wayu waam yekkele
84:15: Yeey, Yalli kaa gacsele! diggah kay Rabbi kaa yabalih sugeeh kay caalat yaaxigeh
84:16: Yalli korta ayról ciggiila qasa caawil xiibite
84:17: Kaadu bar kee usuk gaaboyseemil (yaskatteemil) xiibite
84:18: Kaadu alsal xiibite, noori teetik duuda waqdi
84:19: Diggah gurraak gurral (caalataak caalatal) koretton sinaamey
84:20: Toysa kah aamine waanam maca loonuv? (koros kinnuk)
84:21: Kaadu Qhuraan keenil yankirriyime waqdi, Yallah kah kummaate waanaah kah rammite waanam macalon
84:22: Tonna hinnay, koroosite mari rabak lakal ugut yanim dirabboysah
84:23: Yalli yaaxigeh usun sinni sorkocobbaxittet qellissi haanam. (qinaadi kee koroosannuk)
84:24: Toysa nabiyow ken aytikumus qansarissa digaalál
84:25: Kinnih immay yeemeneeh meqe taamoomi abbaasite mari, aggiriqqe sinni galto le akeeral
85:2: Kaadu Yalli isi naqoosa gaaboysu waamah xagana keenih edde hee ayrol xiibite (woh Qhiyaamah ayró)
85:3: Kaadu sumaaqitée kee, elle sumaaqiteynal xiibite
85:4: Moominiin elle digaaluh Baaxó dageeh qanxise mari abbarsimeh
85:5: Bocot urta gibdi girá elle ursan. (yeemene mara edde carrisoonuh)
85:6: Usun woo waqdi tet amol daffeyak yenen
85:7: Usun yeemene maral baahaanamal gaabowwu iyyeenih assalaalaquk sugen
85:8: Ken kah digaaleenim matan, Yallay mayso leeh fayla lel yeemeneenim akke waytek
85:9: Kaay qaranwaa kee baaxô mulki le (kobor le), kaadu Yalli ummaanim yabali kinniih kaak qellittam matan
85:10: Diggah moominiinih tan labhaa kee moominiinih tan sayyó girat carrise mari, tohuk lakat atoobee weenik, usun jahaannam digaalá lon. Kaadu ken carrissa digaalá lon
85:11: Diggah, yeemeneeh meqe taamoomi abbaasite mari, jannatittey guba weeqaytitte kak gexxa lon, toh kaxxa maffaafa kinni.(asallama)
85:12: Diggah, ku Rabbik xibix kaxxam gibdi digaalah yabbixe wagqdi
85:13: Diggah usuk ginó suge waytik qimbisaah, ken bayseek geeral ken gacisah
85:14: Kaadu usuk dambi cabtiliiy, kacanu le Rabbi moominiinih
85:15: Qarshi le Rabbiy nabna le kinni
85:17: Nabiyow isi ambiya dirabbosse Qandeh xaagi koo gufee
85:18: Firqawnaa kee samuud deqsita mara kinni
85:19: Wonna hinnay koroosite mari ku dirabboysiyyat yan
85:20: Yalli keenik derrek marot ken yabbixe
85:21: Koros kaa elle weelossa inna hinnay, usuk Qhuraanay nabna le kinni
85:22: Usuk daccarsime luucih addal yan. (lowcal macfuuz kinnuk)
86:1: Yalli qaran kee bar mira cutuktal xiibite
86:2: Kaadu maca koo tiysixxigee bar mira cutukti kinnim
86:3: Usuk bolok iyya cutuktay, diifut dite boohaysa kinni
86:4: Hebeltô nafsi mayan malaykatti dacayrih amol kaak yanih akke waytek
86:5: Toysa Seehadayti wagitay cubbusay kak ginniimem
86:6: Usuk leey (woh daacoyta kinnuk) sissikuk kaqittak ginniime
86:7: Numtin xiiron kee barrah aliilik fanak tawqe
86:8: Diggah tohuk kaa gine Rabbi kaa gacsaamah duddali kinni. rabeek lakal
86:9: Kassit! Niyaayik lubbittet qellittem fokkaqsimtaah tamballu wayta ayro (woh Qhiyaamah ayró)
86:10: Toysa Usuk cayla maliiy, cateyna mali
86:12: Kaadu baaxoy teetik tawqeemit baqittal xiibite
86:13: Diggah Qhuraan yani deedalak baxissa maxcó kinni
86:15: Diggah usun Nabiih uma malah malsan.(koros kinnuk)
86:16: Kaadu wohuk gibdi malah anu keenih malsa cakki yambulleemkeh
86:17: Tokkel Nabiyow Ķoros qambaalis, digaalah obtit keenih maqataatakinaay dagoh gide ken qambaalis
87:1: Ku Rabbiy kaxxa fayya leh migaq saytunnos
87:3: Kaadu Kaay tu isih elle faxxa hee innal caggudusey gino tirri hee tet celtaah teetik faxximtaamah
87:4: Kaadu Kaay anxax qayso baaxok yeyyeeqeh
87:5: Tohuk wadir kafteeh data ruma tet abe
87:6: Nabiyow ama qhuraan koo akriyisennooh, inkinnah kaa mahawwenta
87:7: Yalli faxem akke waytek, diggah usuk tambulleem kee qellittam yaaxigeh.(maxcoo kee taamak)
87:9: Tokkel Nabiyow isi mara ĶKassis! kassis tu-xiqek
87:10: Yallak meesitah yan num kassite lek.(moomintu kinnuk)
87:11: Kaadu gibdi umeyni kassitik axxeere-lek.(korosta kinnuk)
87:13: Tohuk lakal usuk tet addal marabaay, mayanuwwa
87:14: Nummah isi nafsi dambik saytunnoyse num naggooweh
87:15: Kaadu isi Rabbih migaq cuseeh kaa inkittoyseeh, wonnaluk salaate num
87:16: Wonna hinnay isin addunyâ mano muxxussan akeerak
87:18: Diggah tama sin kassisnem naharsi kitoobal tan
87:19: Toh Nabii Ibraahim kee Nabii Muusal obte kitooba
88:1: Nabiyow Qhiyaamah ayroy Ghaashiya deqsittah xaagi koo gufeh innaa
88:2: Woo ayro Koros foocitte taqunxeeh digaalat
88:3: Is addunyal umaaneenâ taamittaah, akeeral girah addal digaalâ taqabta
88:5: Niqnâ gibdah facta darah leek tet yafqen
88:6: Usun maaqó malon uma caxay dariiq deqsitta akke waytek
88:8: Moominiin foocitte woo ayro saytuniih wir itta
88:9: Addunyal abitte isi meqe taama takcineeh ruffu itta akeeral
88:11: Uma yab kay addal ma taabba
88:13: Fayya iyya qaraakiy kay addal yan
88:14: Kaadu kobboyaayiy maaqabah massoysimteeh daroorî qaxal heeni kay addal tan edde yaaquboonuh
88:15: Kaadu Rooruh tan barkumaami (makaddid) kay addal tan
88:16: Kaadu fidut tan fidooda kay addal tan
88:17: Ta koros gaali elle ginniime inna ma wagittaay ma cubbussaa
88:18: Kaadu qaran fayya elle heen inna
88:19: Kaadu qaleela elle dabsimteeh, karersimte inna
88:21: Toysa kassis! Nabiyow atu cagalah kassiisé kinnitok
88:22: Atu iimaanah ken dirkisa num hinnito
88:23: Kinnih immay iimaanat derre cabeeh, koroosite num
88:24: Toysa Yalli kaxxa digaalah kaa digaale le
88:25: Diggah ken madaara nee fan akkele rabeeniik lakal
88:26: Tohuk lakal diggah ken cisab (fokkaaqo) kee galtó nel tan
89:2: Kaadu qarafah alsak naharsi tabna baral xiibite
89:3: Kaadu ummaan iimik nammay takkem (xibbaan) kee alluudah taniimil xiibite
89:4: Kaadu bari yamaate waqdii kee bari dardara waqdil xiibite
89:5: Tama hiimiy yalli elle xiibitet kas le numuh kaa xiqtah tan xiiba tanii? yeey, tanih
89:6: Ma tablannaa! Nabiyow ku Rabbi Qaad deqsita marak kah abenna
89:7: Usun Iram deqsittâ kedoy kaxxa caylaay fayya le xisne luk tene
89:8: Is tet celtam Baaxô bagul kak ginniime wayte kedó kinni
89:9: Kaadu Nabiyow ku Rabbi Samuud deqsita maray, qaleela ureeh, qarwah haysitek abem ma tablannaa Waad deqsita daqaaral
89:10: Kaadu Firqawnay xiikooluy (kadeeday) sinam edde digaala lek kah abe inna
89:12: Edde luk usun tet addal umaane yeymeggee mara
89:13: Tokkel Ku Rabbi lafit le digaala keenil caxeeh, oobise
89:14: Nabiyow diggah, ku Rabbi kulli seehadaytih taama dacrisaah ken elle galte le
89:15: Seehadaytuh tu gactek kay Rabbi kaa yiqiyyireeh (mokkoreeh), kaah yemqeeh kaa hatkise kaa tekkek, yi Rabbi yoh yemqeh iyya
89:16: Kaadu kaa yiqiyyireeh, Isi quusi (rizqhi) kaal ceyse kaa tekkek, yi Rabbi yoo yuyqunxeh iyya
89:17: Tu elle tanim tonna hinna a seehadaytow, isin qayxixxuh matamqaanaay kaa matassakaxxan
89:18: Kaadu tu dagoyti askamiyyah sitta milsissan (ma lallabtan)
89:19: Kaadu nagrâ maalu cakki maliinoh gibdi makmoh takmen
89:21: Tonna hinnay, baaxó kaxxa angoyyih tangayyeeh, bululsimiyyah bululsimta waqdi
89:22: Kaadu Nabiyow ku Rabbi yamaateeh, malayka massa massah (saffi saffih) gacta
89:23: Kaadu woo ayró (Qhiyaamah ayro kinnuk) jahannam bahsimah, too ayró seehadayti iimaan kee meqe taamay addunyal cinak suge kassitah, woo kassit kee nadaama mannal tu kaah xiqtaa
89:24: Maganey! inni manol maqaané uysukumeh suginniyoy iyya
89:25: Woo saaku Yallih digaalah innah tan digaalah, num ma digaala
89:26: Kaadu Yallih axawih innah yan axawah num ma yaxaa
89:27: Kee satta iyye nafsow. (yallih cusiyyaa kee iimaanat)
89:28: Isi Rabbî fanah uduur usuk koh yeceem oggolak akcanuk, usuk ku meqe taama kok oggoleeh, Raabitehik
89:29: Toysa Yi naqoosay meqey moominiinih tanih loowot cul
89:30: Kaadu keenî luk Yi jannat cul
90:2: Nabiyow atu ta baaxol dabqih yan num kinnito
90:4: Nummah seehadaytu taqabih ginne addunyal rabba iyyam fan
90:5: Usuk (korosta kinnuk) num ise duude waam yakkalee
90:6: Hiddootak: maggo maalu Mucammad qadaawatah bayse iyya
90:7: Usuk num isi ablewaam yakkalee? yalli kaa yablehik
90:8: Namma inti kaah mahanninoo edde yabaluh
90:9: Kaadu arrabaa kee namma sokto (arrobta kinnuk) kaah mahanninoo
90:10: Kaadu namma gita kaah mabaxxaqisinninoo? (umaanee kee maqaanê gita kinnuk)
90:11: Toysa Isi maalu meqe gital yaceemit dook (woh akeerâ gibdaabina kinnuk) macah tatre wee
90:12: doô tatur kinnim maca koo tiysixxigeeh
90:13: Woh naqoosannuk moomintoh tan naqso currusaanama
90:14: Hinnay qulul edde gibdih yan ayróh addat maaqo yaskameenimi
90:16: Hinnay tumaliy tussinnah burtat kafe yaskameenimi
90:17: Wohuk lakal yeemeneeh, sabril titta farriimeeh, xuwaawal titta farriime marih num yakkeemi
90:18: Woh migdi maray moominiinih yani kinni
90:19: Kaadu ni aayootal (Qhuraan kinnuk) koroosite mari, usun guri mara
90:20: Usun keenil alfimte girah addat yanin
91:1: Yalli ayróo kee tet wallaqental xiibite
91:2: Kaadu alsál xiibite, teetil katayta waqdi
91:3: Kaadu laqól xiibite, is dite kalta waqdi
91:4: Kaadu baral xiibite, usuk ditet baaxó buula waqdi
91:5: Kaadu qaran kee qaran xise Rabbil xiibite
91:6: Kaadu baaxóo kee baaxó fidse Rabbil xiibite
91:7: Kaadu nafsii kee nafsi massoyse Rabbil xiibite
91:8: Tokkel umaanê gitaa kee maqaane teetik edde tan gita teetih baxxaqiseh
91:9: Nummah dambik tet saytunnoyse num naggooweh
91:10: Kaadu nummah umaanet tet yubkune num baxaysiteh
91:11: Samuud deqgsita mari Yallih farmoyta Nabii Saalic dirabboyseh, usun umaanet caddok tatreenimih sabbatah
91:12: Woo marak umaaneh gibdi num kaqteeh alá yusguude waqdi
91:13: Tokkel Yallih farmoyti Nabii saalic keenik iyyeh: Yallih alá umaaneh maxaginaay, tet arakih ayró teetih caba
91:14: Tokkel kaa dirabboyseeniih, tet yusguudeeniih, ken Rabbi digaalá ken duuduseh aliffi keenil hee ken dambih, Woo digaalá keenil massoyseh.(num keenik ma- raaqinna woo digaalák)
91:15: Yalli keenil baaheemik ciggiiliyyah kak meesitâ mali
92:1: Yalli baral xiibite, bari ditet baaxó buula waqdi
92:2: Kaadu laqól xiibite, is diifut baaxó ifissi hayta waqdi
92:3: Kaadu labtii kee saytiyá gine Rabbi isil xiibite
92:4: Diggah sin taama sissinih, isin addunyah taamita maraa kee akeerah taamita marah anuk
92:5: Tokkel Yalli acuya iyyem yeceeh, Yallak meesite numuh tu-gactek
92:6: Kaadu maqaaney (jannat kinnuk) yalli meqe marah massoyse nummaysek
92:8: Kaadu cillaaliteeh, Yallak gaddalime numuh tu-gactek
92:9: Kaadu maqaaney (jannat kinnuk) yalli meqe marah massoyse dirabboysek
92:11: Usuk girat rada waqdi, kay maali tu kaah maxiqa
92:12: Diggah tirtô gitay massa le baxxaqisnam nel tan
92:13: Kaadu diggah ellecabô dabqii (akeera) kee naharsi dabqil (addunyal) enni ittam inkih nanu lino
92:14: Toysa, urtah hadiidigta giral sin meesiisa
92:15: Tet cultam matan gibdi umeyna akke waytek
92:16: Usuk Nabii dirabboyseeh, iimaanat derre cabe numu
92:17: Teetik axxersimele Yallak kaxxam meesita num
92:18: Usuk isi maalu yacee numu, ise saytunnoysâ gideh
92:19: Kaadu hebltô numuy kay xaqul elle galtima niqmat ley kaah yemqe mayan
92:20: Kinnih immay, usuk tamah kah abem fayya iyya Rabbih foocih fayxi kinni
92:21: Kaadu usuk sarrah galtot ruffu axceleeh teetit leedele jannat culuwaa saaku
93:2: Kaadu bari diteh mudugi yakke waqdil xiibite
93:3: Nabiyow ku Rabbi koo cabe weeh, koo anqibe weemil
93:4: Kaadu diggah, wadirsitto (akeera) naharsittok (addunyak) koh tayseemil
93:5: Kaadu ku Rabbi sarroh (akeeral) kulli niqmat koh aceeleeh, kaat leedettooh ruffu kaat axcetto
93:6: Nabiyow ku Rabbi qayxixxuh koo geeh, aracay elle orobta koh maabinnaa? abeh
93:7: Kaadu kitab kee iimaan kinnim aaxige waa numuy garcit yanih koo geeh, tirri koo mahannaa
93:8: Kaadu tu malih koo geeh, koo magaddalisinnaa
93:9: Toysa atu toh teexegek, qayxixxu le cakkik ma gutqin
93:10: Kaadu kallaci aba numuh tu gactek, kaa ma xiiriyinay meqe qangara kaal gacis
93:11: Ku Rabbih niqmatah tugactek, kaat walalaay kaa elle faatit
94:1: Nabiyow Alil koh farakka ma hanninoo islaamaninnoo kee nubuwwannul
94:4: Kaadu fayya koh mahanninoo ku xagar (galab) xago
94:5: Toysa diggah gibdaabinâ luk xabca tan
94:7: Toysa Nabiyow isi caagiidak tamurruqe waqdi, qibaadat taqabaay teetil ingicilliy
94:8: Kaadu Ku Rabbih xaqul taniimih sangeelaay kaa kallacit (jannat kinnuk)
95:1: Yalli xiibiteh Tiin kee Zaytuun deqsitta namma caxal
95:2: Kaadu qaley Tuuri siina deqsittal xiibite
95:3: Kaadu a baaxoy saay lel xiibite. (Makka kinnuk)
95:5: Wohuk lakal usuk yallih amri oggole weeh, kay farmoytit kataate week girak gubi gubah kaa gacsenno
95:6: Takkay ikkal, yeemeneeh meqe taamoomi abbaasite mari, aggiriqqe wayta galtó le akeeral
95:7: Tokkel tahak wadir seehadaytow galtóh ayróh (Qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk ) dirabboysiyyat maca koo bahtaah
95:8: Yalli mekla abba haytaamak meklah yaysi hinnaa? Yeey, kinnih
96:1: Nabiyow ku Rabbiy gino gineh yanih migaaqal ikriy
96:3: Nabiyow! ku Rabbiy kaxxa cinda leh migaaqal ikriy
96:4: Usuk kalamat elle yaktuben gurra barse Rabbi kinni
96:5: Usuk seehadaytu, aaxaguk suge weem barse Rabbi kinni
96:6: Nummah, diggah seehadayti umaanet caddok tatrah
96:8: Diggah madaara ku Rabbî fanah takke Nabiyow
96:9: Nabiyow tableh innaa a numuy waasa? (abu jahal kinnuk)
96:10: Yallih naqsi (Nabii Mucammad Aasaeiiķo kinnuk) salat aba waqdi
96:11: Yoh warisey ta salaatak waasâ num, usuk tirtô bagul yene kaa tekkek
96:12: Hinnay Yallak meesil amrisa num yekkek. (wohuk anninnal kaa waasaah)
96:13: Nabiyow! Yoh warisey ta sinam waasa num Qhuraan dirabboyseeh, iimaanat derre cabe kaa tekkek
96:14: Usuk maaxiginnaa? Diggah Yalli usuk abba haam yable Rabbi kinnim
96:15: Caagid usuk (abu jahal kinnuk) elle yakkale inna hinna, usuk tamahak kate wee kaa tekkek gombo kaak gibdi xibixih abbixenno, jahannam girat kaa gasiyak
96:16: Kay gombo, dirabley, hoxa leh tani kinni
96:17: Tokkel usuk kaa qokla marah deerisay
96:18: Nanu girá dacrissa malaykay giral sinam digaaltah seecennok
96:19: Caagid usuk (abu jahal kinnuk) elle yakkale inna hinna, Nabiyow kay yab moggolinaay, salaatah kummaataay isi Rabbit xayyow
97:1: Diggah Nanu muxxó le baray leylatul Qhadri deqsitat kaa (Qhuraan kinnuk ) oobisne Ramdaanak
97:2: Nabiyow leylatul Qhadri bar kinnim maca koo tiysixxigeeh
97:3: Leylatul Qhadri usuk baray muxxó ley, alfi alsak kayrih aysuk raaqa kinni
97:4: Tama barat malaykaa kee Jibriiliy ruuc deqsita qaraanak edde obta, sinni Rabbih idnih, ummaan caagidiy Yalli woo liggidih addat mekle luk
97:5: Woo bari saayaay nagaaya, maaci maacissi iyyam fanah
98:1: Kitab elle oobe marak yahuud kee nasaarak koroosite maraa kee Yallat agleyta haa mari, baxxaqqa geyyi haanam fanah edde sugen koroosannuk kata mara makkinnon
98:2: Woh Yallih farmoyta Mucammaday saytun kitooba (Qhuraan kinnuk) yakriye
98:3: Woo kitoobah addal nuimmâ xaagittee kee qadaalatal tan amrittey massal tani tan
98:4: Mabaxsiminna kitab akah yontocowwime mari (yahuud kee nasaarak), baxxaqqa (Nabii kee Qhuraan kinnuk) keenih temeeteek wadir akke waytek
98:5: Kaadu usun kalah kah amrisimeenim malon yallah qibaada caglisak, kaa yaqbudeeniih baatil diinittek inkih islaam diinî fanah keltaanaah salat soolisaanaah zaka yaceenim akke waytek, woh massa le diini kinni
98:6: Diggah kitab elle oobe marak koroosittem kee Yallat agleyta haa mari, jahannam girah addal yan, teetil waarak, woo mari usun ginok umaaneh gacta ginó kinnon
98:7: Diggah yeemeneeh meqe taamoomi abe mari, woo mari usun ginok tayse ginó kinnon
98:8: Ken galto ken Rabbih xaqul Qhiyaamah ayro qadni deqsitta jannootay guba weeqaytitte kak gexxa, umman kay addal waarak. Yalli meqe taamoomi keenik raabiteh, kaadu usun kaak raabiteenih keenih abe konnaba, woh isi Rabbik meesite marih galto
99:2: Kaadu baaxó isi addal taniimiy qilsi tayyaaqe waqdi (rabtem tekkek wohuk kalah tanim tekkek)
99:3: Kaadu seehadayti is lem macaay iyya wariggah
99:4: Woo ayró (qhiyaamah ayró) is isi bagul umaanee kee maqaanek abeenimih xaagu inkih warissah
99:5: Diggah ku Rabbi tet amriseemih sabbatah
99:6: Woo ayró sinam soolô ballaaqak taduureh fixiixih anuk, ken taamoomi ken yaybulloonuh ken elle galtoonuh
99:7: Tokkel maqaanek qunxa xuuneyti qilsah gide abe num, wohih galto able le
99:8: Kaadu umaanek qunxa xuuneyti qilsah gide abe num, wohih galto able le
100:1: Yalli qaduwwî fanah sissikuk yarde faarisiy fuftoh fuf iyyal xiibite
100:2: Edde luk xukuuqunut ardi gibdah xinkilliq yayyaaqe faarisil xiibite
100:3: Edde luk qaduwwi maaca warara faarisil xiibite usuk garcit (karcit) anuk
100:4: Tokkel is abtah tan ardih gibdah sawar (fulle) fuluk hayta
100:5: Kaadu woo ardat isi macaxu qaduwwi macaxih addal macsissal xiibite
100:6: Diggah, seehadayti isi Rabbih niqmat yangaddi kinni
100:7: Kaadu diggah usuk wohul isi nafsil sumaaqita num kinni
100:8: Kaadu diggah, usuk maaluh gibdi kacanu le num kinni
100:9: Tokkel mayaaxiga innaa! seehadayti kaa qambaltam magooqat enni ittam Yalli yayyaaqu waa waqdi cisab kee galtoh
100:10: Kaadu umaanee kee maqaanek alilwat qellisimak sugtem geytimtu waytam mayaaxiga innaa
100:11: Diggah ken Rabbi ken kee ken taamoomik woo ayro adda yaaxigi kinni
101:1: Al-Qhaariqa: is Qhiyaamah ayroy sinam lubbitte meesissot taagureh migaq kinni
101:3: Maca koo tiysixxigee Nabiyow Al- Qhaariqa kinnim
101:4: Seehadá fixix kee magga gibdah laahintih (ufuy mali kinnuk) innah edde gacta ayró
101:5: Kaadu qaleelá fakfaken suufih (woh illi xagooru) innah edde gacta ayró
101:6: Tokkel maqaanê miidaan kak yiqilseeh yan numuh tugactek
101:7: Toysa usuk rufto le mano le jannatal
101:8: Kaadu miidaan haliffi akak iyye numuh tu gactek
101:9: Toysa kay orbeyna haawiya deqsitta girá
101:10: Maca koo tiysixxigeeh Nabiyow is kinnim
101:11: Is giray gibdi niqna le kinni
102:1: Maaluu kee xaylô maggal sittal hiddottaanaah (tirtirissan) Yallih taaqatak sin agxisseh
102:2: Rabi sin elelliiy magooqa guffu haytaanam fan
102:4: Kaadu nuimmah sarrah aaxigetton!ellecaboh ayroh digaala siinil obta waqdi
102:5: Tonna hinnay isin sin qambaltam asmatah aaxiginnitoonuy edde taniinimik waasimak tenen
102:6: Yalli xiibiteh diggah, jaciim deqsitta girá ablettoonumul
102:7: Kaadu diggah asmat le mablah tet abletton
102:8: Tohuk lakal diggah woo ayró (Qhiyaamah ayro kinnuk) isin addunyal edde agxitak sugten niqmatak esserimetton
103:3: Yeemene maray meqe taamoomi abeeh, cakkil sitta farriimeeh, sabril sitta farriime koh raaquh
104:1: Ummaan camiliy sinam qaybisaah ilqah Fingaa kee baati tan
104:3: Diggah usuk isi maali isi waarisu waam yakkale addunyal
104:4: Caagid usuk elle yakkale inna hinna! Diggah usuk cutama degqsitta giray edde qambisinnaanihim bokookissát gasyime le
104:5: nabiyow Maca koo tiysixxigeeh cutamá kinnim
104:6: Is Yallih giray ursumteeh hadiidigsinte kinni
104:7: Is leh tan niqnah gibdah xagarak sorkocobbaxittel bukku itta
104:8: Diggah is keenil alfimteh kaluqqu itte
104:9: Usun makaadooday ruubumut tanih addat axawat anuk. (teetik awqe waanâ gidah)
105:1: Nabiyow! Ku Rabbi dakanu leh yan marak kah abenna Matablannaa
105:2: Yalli Ken uma mala finqa maabinnaa
105:3: Kaadu haadá butta buttah keenit ruube itta kataatak
105:4: Xeetiy cararte kallak yani keenil qambissa
105:5: tokkel ruma yekke caffaa kee cafulay yonkommeh inna ken abe
106:1: Qhureyshi deqsittah tan kedo luk sugte qaadáa kee edde sugen saay ma qajjibsittaanaa
106:2: Ken qaada gilal yamanâ fanah arhoh aban safar kee cagay shaamâ fanah aban safar kinni meesite kalah.(Yalli keenih yecee amaan kee niqmata)
106:3: Toysa a Qarih Rabbi (kaqbá kinnuk) yaqbudoonay qibaadá kaah caglisak
106:4: Woh Yallay qululuk ken yoskomeeh, conxok amaan (saay) keenih yecee kinni
107:1: Galtoh ayró dirabboysa numih caalat yoh warisey
107:2: Woh qayxixxu le cakkik gibdi gutqoh gutqa num kinni
107:3: Kaadu usuk tu dagoyta adoobisaanamah sinam milsiisaay isih maaba
107:4: Salat abah yan maray (munaafiqhiin kinnuk) yallak galto edde garrise waah gibdi digaalá tan
107:5: Usun sinni salat waala maray le waktil kaa abewa
107:6: Usun yoobulah sinam sinni tablenkeh meqe taama aba mara kinnon
107:7: Kaadu cine waanam, cina mara gacsah, mingiilaay yakmeenih yaaqubeenim kee wohuk kalah taniimik
108:1: Diggah Nabiyow nanu kawthar deqsita doray jannatti addal yani koh necee
108:2: Tokkel Nabiyow salat kee masgaadá, isi Rabbih caglisak ab
108:3: Nabiyow diggah koo kee atu tirtok luk temeetem niqbi num, usuk samad maliiy kulli kayrik yiggiriqqeh
109:1: Nabiyow koroosite marak ixxic: kee ta koroseey
109:2: Isin taqbuden Numtinwellittee kee sin yallitte maqbuda
109:3: Kaadu isin anu aqbudeh an inki yalla yaqbude mara hinniton
109:4: Kaadu anu isin taqbudeenim (yallak kalah tanim kinnuk). yaqbude num hinniyo
109:5: Kaadu isin anu aqbudeh an inki yalla yaqbude mara hinniton
109:6: Isin sinni diini Litoonuuh, anu inni diini liyo
110:1: Nabiyow Yallih qokol (cató) kee makki fakim koh Yamaate waqdi
110:2: Kaadu seehadá Yallih diinit butta buttah culah table waqdi
110:3: Toysa Ku-Rabbi saytunnos kaa faylisak, kaadu dambi cabti kaal esser,, diggah usuk isil gaca marak gacim (toobat kinnuk) oggolaah qafu aba Rabbi kinnik
111:1: Abii lahab namma gaba finqiteh, kaadu usuk finqiteh
111:2: Kay maaluy yedderee kee kay xaylo Kaah xiqtem maliiy yallih digaalak tu kaak ma catta
111:3: Usuk Ķaxxa ura-le giray hadiidigta Culele
111:4: Kaadu kay barray bocó takkuqih tani, girá kaâ luk culele
111:5: Tet fillat cambok yan akatay is jahannam giráh addal edde diggalsimta yan
112:1: Ixxic nabiyow:usuk Yalla inkittu kinniih, agleyta mali
112:2: Yalli cagalah caagiidaa kee faxaanamih magdabah eleelitan Rabbi kinni
112:4: Kaadu makkinnaay masuginnaay mayan, inkittuy kaa ceelaah kaa qeedaala
113:1: Ixxic Nabiyow: maaca gine Rabbi maggansitaah kaa eleelita
113:3: Kaadu gibdi dite leh yan barih umaanek kaa maggansita, usuk (bar kinnuk) culah yan waqdi
113:4: Ķaadu kuntuubaabil baabah tuf- tufó abtah tan sayyóh umaanek koo maggansita
113:5: Kaadu kuuxe waynanli kuuxe waynan aba waqdih umaanek koo maggansita
114:1: Ixxic Nabiyow: seehada gine Rabbi maggansita
114:2: Seehadah amoytay ken yamlike maggansita.(Yalla kinnuk)
114:3: Seehada kah rammittaah, taqbude Yalla maggansita
114:4: Waswaseynah yan sheytanay, Yallih cusiyyak garcitan waqdi sinam waswasaah, Yalla cusan waqdi qellitah umaanek koo maggansita
114:5: Kaay(sheytan kinnuk)seehadâ sorkocobbaxittet waswasaa kee umaane culsa
114:6: Jinni sheytoonaa kee seehadâ sheytoonak tan waswasak
